\u0627.meaning: is the first letter of the Puś̱ẖto, as also of the Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, and other oriental alphabets; and its powers are precisely the same as in those languages, with which the student of Puś̱ẖto is supposed to be in some measure acquainted. The Afg̠ẖān authors do not make much difference between ا and (ــَــ), and they are often interchanged one for the other, particularly in the vocative case. According to the Arabian system of substituting letters for figures, known as the abjad, the letter ا stands for ʻone.ʼ Placed between two nouns, as in the Persian, it denotes continuity, conjunction, or proximity; as, مخامخ maḵẖā-maḵẖ, Face to face; ورڅا ورڅ wraḏẕā-wraḏẕ, Every day.
\u0627.original: ا alif is the first letter of the Puś̱ẖto, as also of the Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, and other oriental alphabets; and its powers are precisely the same as in those languages, with which the student of Puś̱ẖto is supposed to be in some measure acquainted. The Afg̠ẖān authors do not make much difference between ا and (ــَــ), and they are often interchanged one for the other, particularly in the vocative case. According to the Arabian system of substituting letters for figures, known as the abjad, the letter ا stands for ʻone.ʼ Placed between two nouns, as in the Persian, it denotes continuity, conjunction, or proximity; as, مخامخ maḵẖā-maḵẖ, Face to face; ورڅا ورڅ wraḏẕā-wraḏẕ, Every day.

\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (9th) Father, master, possessor. Sing. and Pl. See پلار
original: s.m. (9th) Father, master, possessor. Sing. and Pl. See پلار

\u0622\u0628.meaning: s.m. (9th) Water; character, honor, reputation, lustre, etc. Sing. and Pl. It is only used in composition; as, آب و ادب āb-o-adab, Courtesy, politeness; آب حیوان āb-i-ḥaiwān, or آب حیات āb-i-ḥaiyāt, The water of life or immortality; آب رو āb-rū, or آب روي āb-rū-e, The water of the face; reputation, renown, honor, lustre; or دَ مخ آب da maḵẖ āb; بي آب َ کول be āba kawul, verb trans. To dishonor, to disgrace, to lower in the estimation of another; بي آبَ کیدل be āba kedal, verb intrans. To become dishonored or disgraced.
original: s.m. (9th) Water; character, honor, reputation, lustre, etc. Sing. and Pl. It is only used in composition; as, آب و ادب āb-o-adab, Courtesy, politeness; آب حیوان āb-i-ḥaiwān, or آب حیات āb-i-ḥaiyāt, The water of life or immortality; آب رو āb-rū, or آب روي āb-rū-e, The water of the face; reputation, renown, honor, lustre; or دَ مخ آب da maḵẖ āb; بي آب َ کول be āba kawul, verb trans. To dishonor, to disgrace, to lower in the estimation of another; بي آبَ کیدل be āba kedal, verb intrans. To become dishonored or disgraced.

\u0627\u0628\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) Denial, refusal. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اباوي ibāwī. ابا کول ibā kawul, verb trans. To refuse, to deny; or ابا راوړل ibā rā-wʿṟṟal.
original: s.f. (6th) Denial, refusal. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اباوي ibāwī. ابا کول ibā kawul, verb trans. To refuse, to deny; or ابا راوړل ibā rā-wʿṟṟal.

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u0628\u06a9\u0631.meaning: or ابوبکر abū-bakr, s. prop. The name of the first Ḵẖalīfah.
original: or ابوبکر abū-bakr, s. prop. The name of the first Ḵẖalīfah.

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u0628\u06cc\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The swallow. Pl. ابابیلونه abā-bīlūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) The swallow. Pl. ابابیلونه abā-bīlūnah.

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u062d\u062a\u064a.meaning: s.m. (5th) The name of a sect of Muḥammadans who maintain that the law and good works are of no avail. Pl. اباحتیان abāḥatī-ān. ابا حتئِي abāḥataʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above sect. Sing. and Pl. Also called ابا حتیه abā-ḥatīaʿh.
original: s.m. (5th) The name of a sect of Muḥammadans who maintain that the law and good works are of no avail. Pl. اباحتیان abāḥatī-ān. ابا حتئِي abāḥataʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above sect. Sing. and Pl. Also called ابا حتیه abā-ḥatīaʿh.

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u062e\u06cc\u0644.meaning: s.m. (6th) The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns. Sing. and Pl. ابا خیله abā-ḵẖelaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0628\u0627\u062e\u06cc\u0644.original: اباخیل abā-ḵẖel, s.m. (6th) The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns. Sing. and Pl. ابا خیله abā-ḵẖelaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0622\u0628\u0627\u062f.meaning: adj. Cultivated, populous, inhabited, prosperous, thriving; (Fem.) آباده ābādaʿh. آباد کیدل ābād kedal, verb intrans. To become cultivated, inhabited, prosperous; آباد کول ābād kawul, verb trans. To cultivate, to people, to make or render prosperous.
original: adj. Cultivated, populous, inhabited, prosperous, thriving; (Fem.) آباده ābādaʿh. آباد کیدل ābād kedal, verb intrans. To become cultivated, inhabited, prosperous; آباد کول ābād kawul, verb trans. To cultivate, to people, to make or render prosperous.

\u0622\u0628\u0627\u062f\u064a.meaning: s.f. (3rd) or آباداني ābādānī, s.f. (3rd) Population, cultivation, abundance, prosperity. Pl. ئِ‍ي aʿī. See ودان and وداني
original: s.f. (3rd) or آباداني ābādānī, s.f. (3rd) Population, cultivation, abundance, prosperity. Pl. ئِ‍ي aʿī. See ودان and وداني

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u0632\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns. ابازيَ abā-zaey, Sing. A male of the Abā-zī tribe. ابازئي abā-zaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0628\u0627\u0633\u06cc\u0646.meaning: or ابا سیند abā-sīnd, s. prop. The Father of Rivers--the Afg̠ẖān name for the Indus (from A ابا ʻfatherʼ, and S سین or سیند ʻa riverʼ).
\u0627\u0628\u0627\u0633\u06cc\u0646.original: اباسین abā-sīn, or ابا سیند abā-sīnd, s. prop. The Father of Rivers--the Afg̠ẖān name for the Indus (from A ابا ʻfatherʼ, and S سین or سیند ʻa riverʼ).

\u0627\u0628\u062a\u062f\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) Beginning, commencement. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. ابتداوي ibtidā-wī. ابتدا کول ibtidā kawul, verb trans. To begin, to commence.
original: s.f. (6th) Beginning, commencement. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. ابتداوي ibtidā-wī. ابتدا کول ibtidā kawul, verb trans. To begin, to commence.

\u0627\u0628\u062a\u0631.meaning: adj. Ruined, spoiled, worthless; dissolute, wanton (from بتر destitute of a tail; H /?/ cut short); (Fem.) ابتره abtaraʿh; ابتر کول abtar kawul, verb trans. To spoil, to ruin. See اوتر
original: adj. Ruined, spoiled, worthless; dissolute, wanton (from بتر destitute of a tail; H /?/ cut short); (Fem.) ابتره abtaraʿh; ابتر کول abtar kawul, verb trans. To spoil, to ruin. See اوتر

\u0627\u0628\u062f\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (5th) A saint, a devotee. Pl. ابدالان abdālān.

\u0627\u062a\u0641\u0627\u0642.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Concord, agreement, agreeing, consenting. Pl. اتفاقونه itta-fāḳūnah. په اتفاق سره pah itta-fāḳ sarah, By chance, accidentally; or اتفاقاً itta-fāḳan. اتقاق کیدل itta-fāḳ kedal, verb intrans. To happen, to befal; to be agreed. اتفاق کول itta-fāḳ kawul, verb trans. To agree, to consent, to concur; to conspire; to happen.
original: s.m. (2nd) Concord, agreement, agreeing, consenting. Pl. اتفاقونه itta-fāḳūnah. په اتفاق سره pah itta-fāḳ sarah, By chance, accidentally; or اتفاقاً itta-fāḳan. اتقاق کیدل itta-fāḳ kedal, verb intrans. To happen, to befal; to be agreed. اتفاق کول itta-fāḳ kawul, verb trans. To agree, to consent, to concur; to conspire; to happen.

\u0627\u062a\u0641\u0627\u062a\u064a.meaning: adj. Accidental, casual, fortuitous. 2. Agreeing, concurring.
original: adj. Accidental, casual, fortuitous. 2. Agreeing, concurring.

\u0627\u062a\u06a9\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) Leaning against, reclining upon, trusting to, confiding in. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اتکاوي itti-kāwī. اتکا کول itti-kā kawul, verb trans. To trust to, to confide in.
original: s.f. (6th) Leaning against, reclining upon, trusting to, confiding in. (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اتکاوي itti-kāwī. اتکا کول itti-kā kawul, verb trans. To trust to, to confide in.

\u0627\u062a\u0644\u0633.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (corrup. of A اطلس), Satin. Pl. اتلسونه at-lasūnah.
\u0627\u062a\u0644\u0633.original: اتلس at-las, s.m. (2nd) (corrup. of A اطلس), Satin. Pl. اتلسونه at-lasūnah.

\u0627\u062a\u0645.meaning: adj. (from اته eight) The eighth; (Fem.) اتمه atamaʿh.
\u0627\u062a\u0645.original: اتم atam, adj. (from اته eight) The eighth; (Fem.) اتمه atamaʿh.

\u0627\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (9th) Completing, perfecting, accomplishing. Sing. and Pl. اتمام کيدل it-mām kedal, verb intrans. To become perfected, completed. اتمام کول it-mām kawul, verb trans. To complete, to perfect, to accomplish.
original: s.m. (9th) Completing, perfecting, accomplishing. Sing. and Pl. اتمام کيدل it-mām kedal, verb intrans. To become perfected, completed. اتمام کول it-mām kawul, verb trans. To complete, to perfect, to accomplish.

\u0627\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0646.meaning: ut-mān-ḏẕī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name also given to the preceding Afg̠ẖān tribe. اتمان څيَ ut-mān-ḏẕaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. اتما څئِي ut-mān-ḏẕaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0646.original: اتمان څي ut-mān-ḏẕī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name also given to the preceding Afg̠ẖān tribe. اتمان څيَ ut-mān-ḏẕaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. اتما څئِي ut-mān-ḏẕaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062a\u0646\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A kind of dance. Pl. اتنرونه a-taṟṟṉūnah. Also written اتنراتن وهل a-taṟṟṉ wahal, or اتنر آچول a-taṟṟṉ āc̱ẖawul, verb trans. To dance the a-taṟṟṉ.
\u0627\u062a\u0646\u0631.original: اتنر a-taṟṟṉ, s.m. (2nd) A kind of dance. Pl. اتنرونه a-taṟṟṉūnah. Also written اتنراتن وهل a-taṟṟṉ wahal, or اتنر آچول a-taṟṟṉ āc̱ẖawul, verb trans. To dance the a-taṟṟṉ.

\u0627\u062a\u0648\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A dish made from flour, sugar, and butter. Pl. اتوبونه a-tūbūnah.
\u0627\u062a\u0648\u0628.original: اتوب a-tūb, s.m. (2nd) A dish made from flour, sugar, and butter. Pl. اتوبونه a-tūbūnah.

\u0627\u062a\u0648\u0632\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. اتوزيَ ato-zaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. اتوزئِي ato-zaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u062a\u0648\u0632\u064a.original: اتوزي ato-zī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. اتوزيَ ato-zaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. اتوزئِي ato-zaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062a\u0647.meaning: adj. Eight; اتم atam, The eighth; (Fem.) اتمه atamaʿh. اته لس a-tah-las, Eighteen; اته ويشت a-tah-wīs̱ẖt, Twenty-eight; اته ديرش a-tah-ders̱ẖ, Thirty-eight; اته څلويښت a-tah-ṯs̱al-weś̱ẖt (W.) or ṯs̱al-weḵ́ẖt (E.) Forty-eight; اته پنڅوس a-tah-pīn-ḏẕos, Fifty-eight; اته شپيته a-tah-s̱ẖpe- tah, Sixty-eight; اته اويا a-tah-aw-yā, Seventy-eight; اته اتيا a-tah at-yā, Eighty-eight; اته نوي a-tah nawī, Ninety-eight.
\u0627\u062a\u0647.original: اته a-tah, adj. Eight; اتم atam, The eighth; (Fem.) اتمه atamaʿh. اته لس a-tah-las, Eighteen; اته ويشت a-tah-wīs̱ẖt, Twenty-eight; اته ديرش a-tah-ders̱ẖ, Thirty-eight; اته څلويښت a-tah-ṯs̱al-weś̱ẖt (W.) or ṯs̱al-weḵ́ẖt (E.) Forty-eight; اته پنڅوس a-tah-pīn-ḏẕos, Fifty-eight; اته شپيته a-tah-s̱ẖpe- tah, Sixty-eight; اته اويا a-tah-aw-yā, Seventy-eight; اته اتيا a-tah at-yā, Eighty-eight; اته نوي a-tah nawī, Ninety-eight.

\u0627\u062a\u064a\u0627.meaning: adj. Eighty; اتيايم at-yāyam, The eightieth; (Fem.) اتيايمه at-yāyamaʿh.
\u0627\u062a\u064a\u0627.original: اتيا at-yā, adj. Eighty; اتيايم at-yāyam, The eightieth; (Fem.) اتيايمه at-yāyamaʿh.

\u0627\u067c\u0627\u0644.meaning: adj. Unemployed, out of place; (Fem.) اټاله a-ṯṯālaʿh.
\u0627\u067c\u0627\u0644.original: اټال a-ṯṯāl, adj. Unemployed, out of place; (Fem.) اټاله a-ṯṯālaʿh.

\u0627\u067c\u06a9.meaning: s. prop. The name of a town on the Indus, the river Indus. (From HI اٿک hinderance, bar, obstruction.)
\u0627\u067c\u06a9.original: اټک aṯṯak, s. prop. The name of a town on the Indus, the river Indus. (From HI اٿک hinderance, bar, obstruction.)

\u0627\u067c\u06a9\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Guess, conjecture, judgment. Pl. اټکلونه aṯṯ-ḳalūnah اټکلول aṯṯ-kalawul, verb trans. To guess, to conjecture, to judge, to think, to estimate. Pres. اټکلوي aṯṯ-kalawī; past ؤاټکلاوه wu-aṯṯ-kalāwuh or ؤ اټکلاوو wu-aṯṯ-kalāwo; fut. ؤ به اټکلوي wu bah aṯṯ-kalawī; imp. ؤ اټکلوه wu-aṯṯ-kalawah; act. part. اټکلوونکيَ aṯṯ-kalawūnkaey or اټکلوونيَ aṯṯ-kalawūnaey; past part. اټکلوليَ aṯṯ-kalawulaey; verb. n. اټکلونه aṯṯ-kalawunaʿh.
original: s.m. (2nd) Guess, conjecture, judgment. Pl. اټکلونه aṯṯ-ḳalūnah اټکلول aṯṯ-kalawul, verb trans. To guess, to conjecture, to judge, to think, to estimate. Pres. اټکلوي aṯṯ-kalawī; past ؤاټکلاوه wu-aṯṯ-kalāwuh or ؤ اټکلاوو wu-aṯṯ-kalāwo; fut. ؤ به اټکلوي wu bah aṯṯ-kalawī; imp. ؤ اټکلوه wu-aṯṯ-kalawah; act. part. اټکلوونکيَ aṯṯ-kalawūnkaey or اټکلوونيَ aṯṯ-kalawūnaey; past part. اټکلوليَ aṯṯ-kalawulaey; verb. n. اټکلونه aṯṯ-kalawunaʿh.

\u0627\u067c\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread or cotton; a hank or skein of thread or silk. Pl. ْي ey. Also written اټيه aṯṯe-aʿh and اټيهه aṯṯeh-aʿh, which see.
\u0627\u067c\u0647.original: اټه aṯṯaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread or cotton; a hank or skein of thread or silk. Pl. ْي ey. Also written اټيه aṯṯe-aʿh and اټيهه aṯṯeh-aʿh, which see.

\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A reel for winding silk, thread, cotton, etc. Pl. اټيرانونه aṯṯe-rānūnah.
\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0627\u0646.original: اټيران aṯṯe-rān, s.m. (2nd) A reel for winding silk, thread, cotton, etc. Pl. اټيرانونه aṯṯe-rānūnah.

\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0644.meaning: verb intrans. To trouble with indigestion; to make dyspeptic. Pres. اټيري aṯṯe-rī; past ؤ اټيره wu aṯṯe-rah; fut. ؤ به اټيري wu bah aṯṯe-rī; imp. ؤ اټيره wu-aṯṯe-rah; act. part. اټيرودنکيَ aṯṯe-rūnkaey or اټيرونيَ aṯṯe-rūnaey; past part. اټيرليَ aṯṯe-ralaey; verb. n. اټيرنه aṯṯe-ranaʿh. See اغیړل اټيرليَ
\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0644.original: اټيرل aṯṯe-ral, verb intrans. To trouble with indigestion; to make dyspeptic. Pres. اټيري aṯṯe-rī; past ؤ اټيره wu aṯṯe-rah; fut. ؤ به اټيري wu bah aṯṯe-rī; imp. ؤ اټيره wu-aṯṯe-rah; act. part. اټيرودنکيَ aṯṯe-rūnkaey or اټيرونيَ aṯṯe-rūnaey; past part. اټيرليَ aṯṯe-ralaey; verb. n. اټيرنه aṯṯe-ranaʿh. See اغیړل اټيرليَ

atteralaey.meaning: (past part.) Undigested, crude, dyspeptic. 2. A person troubled with dyspepsia; (Fem.) اټيرل ِ aṯṯe-rali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ‍يِ ī. See اغيړليَ
atteralaey.original: aṯṯe-ralaey, adj. (past part.) Undigested, crude, dyspeptic. 2. A person troubled with dyspepsia; (Fem.) اټيرل ِ aṯṯe-rali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ‍يِ ī. See اغيړليَ

\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Indigestion, dyspepsia. Pl. يْ ey. See اغيړ
\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0631\u0646\u0647.original: اټيرنه aṯṯe-ranaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Indigestion, dyspepsia. Pl. يْ ey. See اغيړ

\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread or cotton, a hank or skein of thread or silk. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0647.original: اټيه aṯṯe-aʿh, s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread or cotton, a hank or skein of thread or silk. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0647\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread, etc. See preceding. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u067c\u064a\u0647\u0647.original: اټيهه aṯṯeh-aʿh, s.f. (3rd) A ball or reel of thread, etc. See preceding. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u062b\u0628\u0627\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Confirming, corroborating. 2. Confirmation, proof, affirmation. Pl. اثباتونه is̤-bātūnah. اثبات کیدل is̤-bāt kedal or په اثبات رسيدل pah is̤-bāt rasedal, verb intrans. To become corroborated, confirmed, proved. اثبات کول is̤-bāt kawul or په اثبات رسول pah is̤-bāt rasawul, verb trans. To confirm, to corroborate, to prove. See زباد etc.
original: s.m. (2nd) Confirming, corroborating. 2. Confirmation, proof, affirmation. Pl. اثباتونه is̤-bātūnah. اثبات کیدل is̤-bāt kedal or په اثبات رسيدل pah is̤-bāt rasedal, verb intrans. To become corroborated, confirmed, proved. اثبات کول is̤-bāt kawul or په اثبات رسول pah is̤-bāt rasawul, verb trans. To confirm, to corroborate, to prove. See زباد etc.

\u0627\u062b\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A mark, sign, trace, impression, effect. Pl. اثرونه as̤arūnah. اثر کول as̤ar kawul, verb trans. To operate, to take effect, to make impression.
original: s.m. (2nd) A mark, sign, trace, impression, effect. Pl. اثرونه as̤arūnah. اثر کول as̤ar kawul, verb trans. To operate, to take effect, to make impression.

\u0622\u062b\u0631\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of s آسرا), Asylum, defence, hope, trust, reliance, refuge, shelter, means of defence. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0622\u062b\u0631\u0647.original: آثره ās̤-raʿh, s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of s آسرا), Asylum, defence, hope, trust, reliance, refuge, shelter, means of defence. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0685\u06a9\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Dried grapes, raisins. Pl. يْ ey. See وڅکه
\u0627\u0685\u06a9\u0647.original: اڅکه uṯs̱-kaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Dried grapes, raisins. Pl. يْ ey. See وڅکه

\u0627\u0685\u0646\u0693\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To level, to make level, to trim, to make even, to reduce or remove inequalities in anything, to reduce to an even surface, to arrange, to place in order, to classify, to regulate, to assign places to. 2. To long stitch, to baste. 3. To tune, to harmonise, to attune, to arrange, to make even. Pres. اڅنړي aṯs̱aṟṟṉī; past ؤ اڅانړه wu-aṯs̱āṟṟṉah; fut. ؤ به اڅنړي wu bah aṯs̱aṟṟṉī; imp. ؤ اڅنړه wu aṯs̱aṟṟṉah; act. part. اڅنړونکيَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉūnkaey or اڅنړنيَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉūnaey; past part. اڅنړليَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉalaey; verb. n. اڅنړنه aṯs̱aṟṟṉanaʿh.
\u0627\u0685\u0646\u0693\u0644.original: اڅنړل aṯs̱aṟṟṉal, verb trans. To level, to make level, to trim, to make even, to reduce or remove inequalities in anything, to reduce to an even surface, to arrange, to place in order, to classify, to regulate, to assign places to. 2. To long stitch, to baste. 3. To tune, to harmonise, to attune, to arrange, to make even. Pres. اڅنړي aṯs̱aṟṟṉī; past ؤ اڅانړه wu-aṯs̱āṟṟṉah; fut. ؤ به اڅنړي wu bah aṯs̱aṟṟṉī; imp. ؤ اڅنړه wu aṯs̱aṟṟṉah; act. part. اڅنړونکيَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉūnkaey or اڅنړنيَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉūnaey; past part. اڅنړليَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉalaey; verb. n. اڅنړنه aṯs̱aṟṟṉanaʿh.

\u0627\u0685\u0646\u0693\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. (past part.) Basted, stitched. 2. Tuned, arranged, made even; (Fem.) اڅنړلِ aṯs̱aṟṟṉali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ‍يِ ī.
\u0627\u0685\u0646\u0693\u0644\u064a.original: اڅنړليَ aṯs̱aṟṟṉalaey, adj. (past part.) Basted, stitched. 2. Tuned, arranged, made even; (Fem.) اڅنړلِ aṯs̱aṟṟṉali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ‍يِ ī.

\u0627\u062c\u0627\u0628\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Consenting, answering, complying, compliance, consent. Pl. اجابتونه ijā-batūnah. اجابت کول ijā-bat kawul, verb trans. To answer, to comply, to consent to.
original: s.m. (2nd) Consenting, answering, complying, compliance, consent. Pl. اجابتونه ijā-batūnah. اجابت کول ijā-bat kawul, verb trans. To answer, to comply, to consent to.

\u0627\u062c\u0627\u0631\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Hire, rent; income or privilege sold or let for a fixed sum. 2. A farm, a contract. Pl. ْي ey. اجاره دار ijā-raʿh-dār, s.m. (5th) A farmer of land revenue, the holder of a monopoly or contract. Pl. اجاره داران ijā-raʿh-dārān. اجاره کول ijā-raʿh kawul, verb trans. To hire, to rent. اجاره آخستل ijā-raʿh āḵẖistal, verb trans. To take a contract or monopoly.
original: s.f. (3rd) Hire, rent; income or privilege sold or let for a fixed sum. 2. A farm, a contract. Pl. ْي ey. اجاره دار ijā-raʿh-dār, s.m. (5th) A farmer of land revenue, the holder of a monopoly or contract. Pl. اجاره داران ijā-raʿh-dārān. اجاره کول ijā-raʿh kawul, verb trans. To hire, to rent. اجاره آخستل ijā-raʿh āḵẖistal, verb trans. To take a contract or monopoly.

\u0627\u062c\u0627\u0632\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of جوز) Permission, leave, dispensation, sanction, order. Pl. اجازتونه ijā-zatūnah. اجازت آخستل ijā-zat āḵẖistal, verb trans. To take leave, to take permission. اجازت غوښتل ijā-zat-g̠ẖoḵ́ẖtal (E.), or g̠ẖoś̱ẖtal (W.). verb trans. To ask leave, to request sanction or permission. اجازت ورکول ijā-zat war-kawul, verb trans. To grant permission, to give sanction or dispensation.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of جوز) Permission, leave, dispensation, sanction, order. Pl. اجازتونه ijā-zatūnah. اجازت آخستل ijā-zat āḵẖistal, verb trans. To take leave, to take permission. اجازت غوښتل ijā-zat-g̠ẖoḵ́ẖtal (E.), or g̠ẖoś̱ẖtal (W.). verb trans. To ask leave, to request sanction or permission. اجازت ورکول ijā-zat war-kawul, verb trans. To grant permission, to give sanction or dispensation.

\u0627\u062c\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Retribution, reward of good or bad actions; hire, fare, fee. Pl. اجرونه ajarūnah. اجرو ورکول ajar war-kawul, verb trans. To recompense, to reward.
original: s.m. (2nd) Retribution, reward of good or bad actions; hire, fare, fee. Pl. اجرونه ajarūnah. اجرو ورکول ajar war-kawul, verb trans. To recompense, to reward.

\u0627\u062c\u0631\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Wages, hire, reward. Pl. اجرتونه uj-ratūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Wages, hire, reward. Pl. اجرتونه uj-ratūnah.

\u0627\u062c\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The term of life, the hour of death; fate, death. 2. A stated time, delay, respite. Pl. اجلونه ajalūnah. اجل رسيده ajāl rasīdah, adj. Overtaken by fate. اجل نيوليَ ajal nī-walaey, adj. Seized by fate, in the jaws of death. د اجل پياله da ajal pī-ālaʿ, The cup of fate or destiny.
original: s.m. (2nd) The term of life, the hour of death; fate, death. 2. A stated time, delay, respite. Pl. اجلونه ajalūnah. اجل رسيده ajāl rasīdah, adj. Overtaken by fate. اجل نيوليَ ajal nī-walaey, adj. Seized by fate, in the jaws of death. د اجل پياله da ajal pī-ālaʿ, The cup of fate or destiny.

\u0627\u062c\u0645\u0627\u0639.meaning: s.f. (1st) (inf. IV of جمع) An assembly, senate, council, a crowd, collection; amount, whole. Pl. اجماع ِ ijmāœi.
original: s.f. (1st) (inf. IV of جمع) An assembly, senate, council, a crowd, collection; amount, whole. Pl. اجماع ِ ijmāœi.

\u0627\u062c\u0645\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (9th) (inf IV of جمل) An abstract, synopsis. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) (inf IV of جمل) An abstract, synopsis. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062c\u0646\u0627\u0633.meaning: s. pl. of جنس, which see.
original: s. pl. of جنس, which see.

original: adj. Foreign, strange, unknown (person). See پرد‍ي

\u0627\u062c\u0648\u0628\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Wonder, astonishment, miracle, prodigy. Pl. ْ‍ي ey. See اعجوبه
\u0627\u062c\u0648\u0628\u0647.original: اجوبه ajū-baʿh, s.f. (3rd) Wonder, astonishment, miracle, prodigy. Pl. ْ‍ي ey. See اعجوبه

\u0627\u0686\u062a.meaning: adj. Raised, lifted, high, lofty; (Fem.) اچته uc̱ẖataʿh. اچت واليَ uc̱ẖat-wālaey, s.m. (1st) Height, altitude, elevation, loftiness. Pl. واليِ wālī. اچت کيدل uc̱ẖat kedal, verb intrans. To become raised or elevated, to become or grow high or lofty. اچت کول uc̱ẖat kawul, verb trans. To raise, to elevate, to render high or lofty. اچت نیول uc̱ẖat nī-wal, verb trans. To hold up, to raise on high. See اوچت
\u0627\u0686\u062a.original: اچت uc̱ẖat, adj. Raised, lifted, high, lofty; (Fem.) اچته uc̱ẖataʿh. اچت واليَ uc̱ẖat-wālaey, s.m. (1st) Height, altitude, elevation, loftiness. Pl. واليِ wālī. اچت کيدل uc̱ẖat kedal, verb intrans. To become raised or elevated, to become or grow high or lofty. اچت کول uc̱ẖat kawul, verb trans. To raise, to elevate, to render high or lofty. اچت نیول uc̱ẖat nī-wal, verb trans. To hold up, to raise on high. See اوچت

\u0627\u0686\u0631\u0644\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) The forehead, the brow. Pl. يِ ī. See وچولي and تندي
\u0627\u0686\u0631\u0644\u064a.original: اچرليَ uc̱ẖarlaey, s.m. (1st) The forehead, the brow. Pl. يِ ī. See وچولي and تندي

\u0627\u0686\u06a9\u0632\u064a.meaning: or اڅکزي aṯs̱akzī, s.m. (1st) The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. اڅکزيَ ac̱ẖakzaey or اڅکزيَ aṯs̱akzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe. اچکزئي ac̱ẖakzaʿī or اڅکزئِي aṯs̱akzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0686\u06a9\u0632\u064a.original: اچکزي ac̱ẖak-zī or اڅکزي aṯs̱akzī, s.m. (1st) The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. اڅکزيَ ac̱ẖakzaey or اڅکزيَ aṯs̱akzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe. اچکزئي ac̱ẖakzaʿī or اڅکزئِي aṯs̱akzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To throw, to cast, to fling, to impel, to chuck, to fire off, to launch, to let fly, to discharge, to let off, etc. Pres. آچوي āc̱ẖawī; past واچاوه wāc̱ẖāwuh or واچاوو wāc̱ẖāwo; fut. وا به چوي wā bah c̱ẖawī; imp. واچوه wāc̱ẖawah; act. part. آچوونکيَ āc̱ẖawūnkaey or آچوونيَ āc̱ẖawūnaey; past part. آچوليَ āc̱ẖawulaey; verb. n. آچونه āc̱ẖawunaʿh.
\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0644.original: آچول āc̱ẖawul, verb trans. To throw, to cast, to fling, to impel, to chuck, to fire off, to launch, to let fly, to discharge, to let off, etc. Pres. آچوي āc̱ẖawī; past واچاوه wāc̱ẖāwuh or واچاوو wāc̱ẖāwo; fut. وا به چوي wā bah c̱ẖawī; imp. واچوه wāc̱ẖawah; act. part. آچوونکيَ āc̱ẖawūnkaey or آچوونيَ āc̱ẖawūnaey; past part. آچوليَ āc̱ẖawulaey; verb. n. آچونه āc̱ẖawunaʿh.

\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. (past part.) Thrown, cast, impelled, let off, discharged, etc.; (Fem.) آچولِ āc̱ẖawuli. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ِي ī.
\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0644\u064a.original: آچوليَ āc̱ẖawulaey, adj. (past part.) Thrown, cast, impelled, let off, discharged, etc.; (Fem.) آچولِ āc̱ẖawuli. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ِي ī.

\u0627\u0686\u0648\u0644\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) The forehead, the brow. Pl. يِ ī. See وچوليَ
\u0627\u0686\u0648\u0644\u064a.original: اچوليَ uc̱ẖ-wulaey, s.m. (1st) The forehead, the brow. Pl. يِ ī. See وچوليَ

\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0646\u064a.meaning: adj. A child brought forth before its time; fœtus, embryo; (Fem.) آچونِ āc̱ẖawuni. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِِ ī.
\u0622\u0686\u0648\u0646\u064a.original: آچونيَ āc̱ẖawunaey, adj. A child brought forth before its time; fœtus, embryo; (Fem.) آچونِ āc̱ẖawuni. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِِ ī.

\u0627\u062d\u062f.meaning: s.m. (6th) Unity; an unit, one. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) Unity; an unit, one. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062d\u0627\u062f\u064a\u062b.meaning: s.m. (6th) (Pl. of حديث) Traditions, (particularly) the sayings of Muḥammad. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u062d\u0627\u062f\u064a\u062b.original: احاديث aḥādīs̤, s.m. (6th) (Pl. of حديث) Traditions, (particularly) the sayings of Muḥammad. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062d\u0627\u0637\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) (inf. IV of حوط) An enclosure, a fence, a surrounding; compass, circuit, etc. Pl. يْ ey. احاطه کول iḥā-t̤aʿh kawul, verb trans. To enclose, to fence, to surround, to besiege, to blockade, to invest. 2. To comprehend.
original: s.f. (3rd) (inf. IV of حوط) An enclosure, a fence, a surrounding; compass, circuit, etc. Pl. يْ ey. احاطه کول iḥā-t̤aʿh kawul, verb trans. To enclose, to fence, to surround, to besiege, to blockade, to invest. 2. To comprehend.

\u0627\u062d\u0628\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (Pl. of حبيب) Lovers, beloved friends.
original: s.m. (Pl. of حبيب) Lovers, beloved friends.

\u0627\u062d\u062a\u0631\u0627\u0632.meaning: s.m. (9th) Taking care, abstaining, abstinence, keeping from improper actions, forbearance, regimen, controlling one's passions. Sing. and Pl. احتراز کول iḥ-tirāz kawul, verb trans. To abstain, to forbear, to control one's passions.
original: s.m. (9th) Taking care, abstaining, abstinence, keeping from improper actions, forbearance, regimen, controlling one's passions. Sing. and Pl. احتراز کول iḥ-tirāz kawul, verb trans. To abstain, to forbear, to control one's passions.

\u0627\u062d\u062a\u0644\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (9th) (inf. VIII of حلم) Dreaming; nocturnal pollution. Sing. and Pl. See اودس اوښتل and شيطان خطا کول
original: s.m. (9th) (inf. VIII of حلم) Dreaming; nocturnal pollution. Sing. and Pl. See اودس اوښتل and شيطان خطا کول

\u0627\u062d\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of حمل) Laying on a burden; bearing, patience. 2. Possibility, probability. Pl. احتمالونه iḥ-timālūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of حمل) Laying on a burden; bearing, patience. 2. Possibility, probability. Pl. احتمالونه iḥ-timālūnah.

\u0627\u062d\u062a\u064a\u0627\u062c.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Necessity, want, need, indigence, exigence, occasion. Pl. احتياجونه iḥ-tiyājūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Necessity, want, need, indigence, exigence, occasion. Pl. احتياجونه iḥ-tiyājūnah.

\u0627\u062d\u062a\u064a\u0627\u0637.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Care, caution, circumspection, foresight. Pl. احتياطونه iḥ-tiyāt̤ūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Care, caution, circumspection, foresight. Pl. احتياطونه iḥ-tiyāt̤ūnah.

\u0627\u062d\u0631\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of حرم) Act of forbidding; putting on a pilgrim's habit at a certain distance from Makka; the cloak or mantle alluded to. Pl. احرامونه iḥ-rāmūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of حرم) Act of forbidding; putting on a pilgrim's habit at a certain distance from Makka; the cloak or mantle alluded to. Pl. احرامونه iḥ-rāmūnah.

\u0627\u062d\u0633\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Beneficence, benevolence, favour, kindness, courtesy. Pl. احسانونه iḥ-sānūnah. احسان کول iḥ-sān kawul, verb trans. To confer favor or benefit, to oblige, to gratify.
original: s.m. (2nd) Beneficence, benevolence, favour, kindness, courtesy. Pl. احسانونه iḥ-sānūnah. احسان کول iḥ-sān kawul, verb trans. To confer favor or benefit, to oblige, to gratify.

\u0627\u062d\u06a9\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (6th) (Pl. of حکم) Orders, commands, decrees. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) (Pl. of حکم) Orders, commands, decrees. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062d\u0645\u0642.meaning: adj. Foolish, very ignorant; a blockhead, a dunce; (Fem.) احمقه aḥ-maḳaʿh. احمقي aḥ-maḳī, s.f. (3rd). Pl. ئِي aʿī; or احمق واليَ aḥ-maḳ wālaey, s.m. (1st) Stupidity, ignorance, doltishness. Pl وال‍ wā-lī, and احمق توب aḥ-maḳ-tob, s.m. (2nd). Pl. توبونه tob-ūnah.
original: adj. Foolish, very ignorant; a blockhead, a dunce; (Fem.) احمقه aḥ-maḳaʿh. احمقي aḥ-maḳī, s.f. (3rd). Pl. ئِي aʿī; or احمق واليَ aḥ-maḳ wālaey, s.m. (1st) Stupidity, ignorance, doltishness. Pl وال‍ wā-lī, and احمق توب aḥ-maḳ-tob, s.m. (2nd). Pl. توبونه tob-ūnah.

\u0627\u062d\u0648\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (6th) Pl. of حال) Events, occurrences, state, account, condition, circumstances. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) Pl. of حال) Events, occurrences, state, account, condition, circumstances. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062d\u0648\u0644.meaning: adj. Squinting, one who squints or sees objects double; (Fem.) احوله aḥ-walaʿh.
original: adj. Squinting, one who squints or sees objects double; (Fem.) احوله aḥ-walaʿh.

\u0622\u062e.meaning: interj. An exclamation of joy or pleasure. Ah! How good! 2. An imitative sound of coughing. آخ آخ āḵẖ āḵẖ, Well done! bravo! آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ or آخښ آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ-āḵẖḵ́ẖ, and آخ سخ āḵẖ saḵẖ, Oh! alas! sorrow!
original: interj. An exclamation of joy or pleasure. Ah! How good! 2. An imitative sound of coughing. آخ آخ āḵẖ āḵẖ, Well done! bravo! آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ or آخښ آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ-āḵẖḵ́ẖ, and آخ سخ āḵẖ saḵẖ, Oh! alas! sorrow!

\u0627\u062e\u0627\u0693\u0647.meaning: s.m. (6th) Plastering, bedaubing; plaster, the plastering of a wall, etc. Sing. and Pl. See اخيړل
\u0627\u062e\u0627\u0693\u0647.original: اخاړه aḵẖā-ṟṟah, s.m. (6th) Plastering, bedaubing; plaster, the plastering of a wall, etc. Sing. and Pl. See اخيړل

\u0622\u062e\u0627\u0646\u0693\u0626\u06.meaning: 2nd pers. pl. of imp. of آخستل, ʻTake you up,ʼ ʻseize you,ʼ etc. It is not common.
\u0622\u062e\u0627\u0646\u0693\u0626\u06.original: آخانړئيِ āḵẖāṟṟṉaʿī, 2nd pers. pl. of imp. of آخستل, ʻTake you up,ʼ ʻseize you,ʼ etc. It is not common.

\u0627\u062e\u0628\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (Pl. of خبر) News, intelligence, a newspaper. Pl. اخبارونه aḵẖ-bārūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (Pl. of خبر) News, intelligence, a newspaper. Pl. اخبارونه aḵẖ-bārūnah.

\u0627\u062e\u062a\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A star, a constellation. 2. Good fortune, good omen, horoscope. Pl. اخترونه aḵẖ-tarūnah. See page 1093.
original: s.m. (2nd) A star, a constellation. 2. Good fortune, good omen, horoscope. Pl. اخترونه aḵẖ-tarūnah. See page 1093.

\u0627\u062e\u062a\u069a\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (9th) Abridgment, abbreviation, brevity, contraction, cutting short. Sing. and Pl. اختصار کول iḵẖ-tiṣār kawul, verb trans. To abridge, to contract, to abbreviate.
original: s.m. (9th) Abridgment, abbreviation, brevity, contraction, cutting short. Sing. and Pl. اختصار کول iḵẖ-tiṣār kawul, verb trans. To abridge, to contract, to abbreviate.

\u0627\u062e\u062a\u0644\u0627\u0637.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The act of mixing, mixture, confusion; commerce, intercourse, friendship. Pl. اختلاطونه iḵẖ-tilāt̤ūnah. اختلاط کول iḵẖ-tilāt̤ kawul, verb trans. To hold intercourse.
original: s.m. (2nd) The act of mixing, mixture, confusion; commerce, intercourse, friendship. Pl. اختلاطونه iḵẖ-tilāt̤ūnah. اختلاط کول iḵẖ-tilāt̤ kawul, verb trans. To hold intercourse.

\u0627\u062e\u062a\u0644\u0627\u0641.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Difference of opinion, opposition, discord, misunderstanding, breach, coolness. Pl. اختلافونه iḵẖ-tilāfūnah. اختلاف کول iḵẖ-tilāf kawul, verb trans. To quarrel, to differ in opinion.
original: s.m. (2nd) Difference of opinion, opposition, discord, misunderstanding, breach, coolness. Pl. اختلافونه iḵẖ-tilāfūnah. اختلاف کول iḵẖ-tilāf kawul, verb trans. To quarrel, to differ in opinion.

\u0622\u062e\u062a\u0647.meaning: adj. Caught, imprisoned, confined, involved (in calamity). 2. Castrated, آخته کول āḵẖ-tah kawul, verb trans. To involve, to confine, to imprison. 2. To castrate. آخته کيدل āḵẖ-tah kedal, verb intrans. To become involved (in calamity, etc.), to be caught, imprisoned, confined. 2. To be castrated.
original: adj. Caught, imprisoned, confined, involved (in calamity). 2. Castrated, آخته کول āḵẖ-tah kawul, verb trans. To involve, to confine, to imprison. 2. To castrate. آخته کيدل āḵẖ-tah kedal, verb intrans. To become involved (in calamity, etc.), to be caught, imprisoned, confined. 2. To be castrated.

\u0627\u062e\u062a\u064a\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Choice, approbation, authority, power, free-will, option. Pl. اختيارونه iḵẖ-tiyārūnah. اختيار لرل iḵẖ-tiyār laral, verb trans. To have the option, to possess authority, power, free-will, etc. اختيارول iḵẖ-tiyārawul, verb trans. To choose, to adopt, to approve of.
original: s.m. (2nd) Choice, approbation, authority, power, free-will, option. Pl. اختيارونه iḵẖ-tiyārūnah. اختيار لرل iḵẖ-tiyār laral, verb trans. To have the option, to possess authority, power, free-will, etc. اختيارول iḵẖ-tiyārawul, verb trans. To choose, to adopt, to approve of.

\u0622\u062e\u0631.meaning: adj. Last, latter. 2. s.m. (9th) The end, issue, termination. Sing. and Pl. (Fem.) آخره āḵẖiraʿh. آخراً āḵẖiraṇ, adv. Lastly, finally. آخرکيدل āḵẖir kedal, verb intrans. To finish, to terminate, to end. آخر کول āḵẖir kawul, verb trans. To bring to an end, to terminate, to conclude.
original: adj. Last, latter. 2. s.m. (9th) The end, issue, termination. Sing. and Pl. (Fem.) آخره āḵẖiraʿh. آخراً āḵẖiraṇ, adv. Lastly, finally. آخرکيدل āḵẖir kedal, verb intrans. To finish, to terminate, to end. آخر کول āḵẖir kawul, verb trans. To bring to an end, to terminate, to conclude.

\u0627\u062e\u0631\u0627\u062c.meaning: s.m. (9th) Drawing forth, derivation; expulsion, evacuation. Sing. and Pl. اخراج کول iḵẖ-rāj kawul, verb trans. To expel, to evacuate, to draw forth. See یستل
original: s.m. (9th) Drawing forth, derivation; expulsion, evacuation. Sing. and Pl. اخراج کول iḵẖ-rāj kawul, verb trans. To expel, to evacuate, to draw forth. See یستل

\u0622\u062e\u0631\u062a.meaning: s.m. (9th) Futurity, a future state, the world to come. Sing. and Pl. ورڅ or دَ آخرت روڅ da āḵẖirat rwaḏẕ or wraḏẕ, The last, or judgment day.
original: s.m. (9th) Futurity, a future state, the world to come. Sing. and Pl. ورڅ or دَ آخرت روڅ da āḵẖirat rwaḏẕ or wraḏẕ, The last, or judgment day.

\u0622\u062e\u0633\u062a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To take, to seize, to lay hold of, to gripe, to capture, to apprehend, etc. Pres. آخلي āḵẖlī; past واخست wa-ḵẖist; fut. وابه خلي wā bah ḵẖlī; imp. واخله wāḵẖ-lah; act. part. آخستونکيَ āḵẖistūnkaey or آخستونيَ āḵẖistūnaey; past part. آخستليَ āḵẖistalaey or آخستي āḵẖistaey; verb. n. آخستنه āḵẖistanaʿh or آخسته āḵẖistah.
\u0622\u062e\u0633\u062a\u0644.original: آخستل āḵẖistal, verb trans. To take, to seize, to lay hold of, to gripe, to capture, to apprehend, etc. Pres. آخلي āḵẖlī; past واخست wa-ḵẖist; fut. وابه خلي wā bah ḵẖlī; imp. واخله wāḵẖ-lah; act. part. آخستونکيَ āḵẖistūnkaey or آخستونيَ āḵẖistūnaey; past part. آخستليَ āḵẖistalaey or آخستي āḵẖistaey; verb. n. آخستنه āḵẖistanaʿh or آخسته āḵẖistah.

\u0622\u062e\u0633\u062a\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) (verb. n.) Seizing, taking, grasping, laying hold of, apprehending. Pl. يْ ey. آخسته āḵẖistah, s.m. (6th) (verb. n.) Sing. and Pl.
\u0622\u062e\u0633\u062a\u0646\u0647.original: آخستنه āḵẖistanaʿh, s.f. (3rd) (verb. n.) Seizing, taking, grasping, laying hold of, apprehending. Pl. يْ ey. آخسته āḵẖistah, s.m. (6th) (verb. n.) Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u062e\u069a.meaning: interj. Alas! sorrow! well-a-day! also آخښ آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ-āḵẖḵ́ẖ and آخ سخ āḵẖ-saḵẖ.
\u0622\u062e\u069a.original: آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ, interj. Alas! sorrow! well-a-day! also آخښ آخښ āḵẖḵ́ẖ-āḵẖḵ́ẖ and آخ سخ āḵẖ-saḵẖ.

\u0622\u062e\u069a\u064a.meaning: (W.) or āḵẖ-ḵ́ẖaey (E.) s.m. (1st) A wife's brother, a sister's husband, a brother-in-law. Pl. يْ ey. See اوښيَ
\u0622\u062e\u069a\u064a.original: آخښي āḵẖ-ś̱ẖaey (W.) or āḵẖ-ḵ́ẖaey (E.) s.m. (1st) A wife's brother, a sister's husband, a brother-in-law. Pl. يْ ey. See اوښيَ

\u0627\u062e\u06ab\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A firebrand, a spark of fire. Pl. اخګرونه aḵẖ-garūnah. See سکروټه
original: s.m. (2nd) A firebrand, a spark of fire. Pl. اخګرونه aḵẖ-garūnah. See سکروټه

\u0627\u062e\u0644\u0627\u0635.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Sincerity, friendship, affection, love. Pl. اخلاصِونه iḵẖ-lāṣūnah. له اخلاصه lah iḵẖ-lāṣah or له اخلاصَ lah iḵẖ-lāṣa or په اخلاص سره pah iḵẖ-lāṣ sarah, adv. Sincerely, lovingly, affectionately.
original: s.m. (2nd) Sincerity, friendship, affection, love. Pl. اخلاصِونه iḵẖ-lāṣūnah. له اخلاصه lah iḵẖ-lāṣah or له اخلاصَ lah iḵẖ-lāṣa or په اخلاص سره pah iḵẖ-lāṣ sarah, adv. Sincerely, lovingly, affectionately.

\u0627\u062e\u0644\u0627\u0642.meaning: s.m. (6th) (Pl. of خلق) Manners, disposition, virtues, morality. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) (Pl. of خلق) Manners, disposition, virtues, morality. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u062e\u0648\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) or (5th) A manger, a trough. 3. A stable, a stall. Pl. آخورونه āḵẖorūnah or آخوران āḵẖorān.
original: s.m. (2nd) or (5th) A manger, a trough. 3. A stable, a stall. Pl. آخورونه āḵẖorūnah or آخوران āḵẖorān.

\u0622\u062e\u0648\u0646.meaning: or آخوند āḵẖūnd, s.m. (5th) An instructor, a teacher, a preceptor, a learned man. Pl. آخونان āḵẖūnān or آخوندان āḵẖūndān. آخونزاده āḵẖūnzādah, s.m. (5th) A tutor, a doctor, a master, a learned man. Pl. آخونزادګان āḵẖūnzādagān.
original: or آخوند āḵẖūnd, s.m. (5th) An instructor, a teacher, a preceptor, a learned man. Pl. آخونان āḵẖūnān or آخوندان āḵẖūndān. آخونزاده āḵẖūnzādah, s.m. (5th) A tutor, a doctor, a master, a learned man. Pl. آخونزادګان āḵẖūnzādagān.

\u0627\u062e\u064a\u0693\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To plaster, to besmear, to overlay with plaster, to mend, etc. Pres. اخيړي aḵẖeṟṟī; past ؤ اخيړه wu-aḵẖeṟṟah; fut. ؤ به اخيړي wu bah aḵẖeṟṟī; imp. ؤاخيړه wu-aḵẖeṟṟah; act. part. اخيړونکيَ aḵẖeṟṟūnkaey or اخِيړونيَ aḵẖeṟṟūnaey; past part. اخيړليَ aḵẖeṟṟalaey; verb. n. اخيړنه aḵẖeṟṟanaʿh or اخاړه aḵẖāṟṟah.
\u0627\u062e\u064a\u0693\u0644.original: اخيړل aḵẖeṟṟal, verb trans. To plaster, to besmear, to overlay with plaster, to mend, etc. Pres. اخيړي aḵẖeṟṟī; past ؤ اخيړه wu-aḵẖeṟṟah; fut. ؤ به اخيړي wu bah aḵẖeṟṟī; imp. ؤاخيړه wu-aḵẖeṟṟah; act. part. اخيړونکيَ aḵẖeṟṟūnkaey or اخِيړونيَ aḵẖeṟṟūnaey; past part. اخيړليَ aḵẖeṟṟalaey; verb. n. اخيړنه aḵẖeṟṟanaʿh or اخاړه aḵẖāṟṟah.

\u0627\u062e\u064a\u0693\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Plastering, bedaubing; plaster or plastering of a wall. Pl. يْ ey. See اخاړه
\u0627\u062e\u064a\u0693\u0646\u0647.original: اخيړنه aḵẖeṟṟanaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Plastering, bedaubing; plaster or plastering of a wall. Pl. يْ ey. See اخاړه

\u0627\u062f\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) Performance, payment, discharge, execution. 2. Blandishment, coquetry, (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اداوي adāwī. ادا کيدل adā kedal, verb intrans. To be performed, fulfilled, executed. ادا کول adā kawul, verb trans. To perform, to fulfil, to discharge.
original: s.f. (6th) Performance, payment, discharge, execution. 2. Blandishment, coquetry, (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. اداوي adāwī. ادا کيدل adā kedal, verb intrans. To be performed, fulfilled, executed. ادا کول adā kawul, verb trans. To perform, to fulfil, to discharge.

\u0627\u062f\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Politeness, courtesy, good-breeding, respect. Pl. ادبونه adabūnah. ادب کول adab kawul, verb trans. To respect, to behave politely. په ادب pah adab or په ادب سره pah adab sarah, adv. Politely, with respect, courteously, becomingly.
original: s.m. (2nd) Politeness, courtesy, good-breeding, respect. Pl. ادبونه adabūnah. ادب کول adab kawul, verb trans. To respect, to behave politely. په ادب pah adab or په ادب سره pah adab sarah, adv. Politely, with respect, courteously, becomingly.

\u0627\u062f\u0631\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Flowing of milk. 2. Involuntary discharge of urine. 3. Munificence, liberality. Pl. ادرارونه id-rārūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Flowing of milk. 2. Involuntary discharge of urine. 3. Munificence, liberality. Pl. ادرارونه id-rārūnah.

\u0627\u062f\u0631\u0627\u0643.meaning: s.m. (9th) Capacity, genius, understanding, comprehension. Sing. and Pl. ادراك کول id-rāk kawul, verb trans. To comprehend, to understand.
original: s.m. (9th) Capacity, genius, understanding, comprehension. Sing. and Pl. ادراك کول id-rāk kawul, verb trans. To comprehend, to understand.

\u0627\u062f\u0631\u06a9.meaning: s.m. (6th) Ginger in the undried state. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) Ginger in the undried state. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u062f\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Exchange, barter, chopping and changing; confusion. Pl. ادل بدلونه adal-badalūnah. ادل بدل کول adal-badal kawul, verb trans. To barter, to exchange, to swop.
original: s.m. (2nd) Exchange, barter, chopping and changing; confusion. Pl. ادل بدلونه adal-badalūnah. ادل بدل کول adal-badal kawul, verb trans. To barter, to exchange, to swop.

\u0622\u062f\u0645.meaning: ādam-ḵẖel, s.m. (6th) The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. 2. A man of the tribe. Sing. and Pl. آدم خيله ādam-ḵẖelaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0622\u062f\u0645.original: آدم خيل ādam-ḵẖel, s.m. (6th) The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe. 2. A man of the tribe. Sing. and Pl. آدم خيله ādam-ḵẖelaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0622\u062f\u0645\u064a\u064e.meaning: s.m. (1st) A man, a human being, an individual. Pl. يِ ī. s.f. (6th) آدمئِي ādamaʿī, A woman, a female. Sing. and Pl. See سړي and ښڅه
original: s.m. (1st) A man, a human being, an individual. Pl. يِ ī. s.f. (6th) آدمئِي ādamaʿī, A woman, a female. Sing. and Pl. See سړي and ښڅه

\u0622\u062f\u0645\u064a\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Humanity, civility. Pl. آدميتونه ādmī-yatūnah. See سړيتوب
original: s.m. (2nd) Humanity, civility. Pl. آدميتونه ādmī-yatūnah. See سړيتوب

\u0627\u062f\u0646\u0627.meaning: adj. Inferior, mean, little, trivial, small, unimportant. (Masc. and Fem.)
original: adj. Inferior, mean, little, trivial, small, unimportant. (Masc. and Fem.)

\u0627\u062f\u0648\u0628\u062f\u0648.meaning: adj. Much swollen, very fat. (Masc. and Fem.)
\u0627\u062f\u0648\u0628\u062f\u0648.original: ادوبدو adū-badū, adj. Much swollen, very fat. (Masc. and Fem.)

\u0627\u062f\u064a.meaning: A term of address or endearment to a mother; mother! See ابي
\u0627\u062f\u064a.original: ادي adey, A term of address or endearment to a mother; mother! See ابي

\u0622\u062f\u064a\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Friday, the sabbath of the Muḥammadans. Pl. يْ ey. See اتبار
original: s.f. (3rd) Friday, the sabbath of the Muḥammadans. Pl. يْ ey. See اتبار

\u0627\u062f\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (6th) A division of the lands of a village. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u062f\u0626\u064a.original: ادئٍي adaʿī, s.f. (6th) A division of the lands of a village. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0630\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The summons to prayer (usually proclaimed from the minaret of a mosque). Pl. اذانونه aẕānūnah. اذان ويل aẕān wa-yal, verb trans. To repeat the call to prayer, to summon to prayer.
original: s.m. (2nd) The summons to prayer (usually proclaimed from the minaret of a mosque). Pl. اذانونه aẕānūnah. اذان ويل aẕān wa-yal, verb trans. To repeat the call to prayer, to summon to prayer.

\u0627\u0630\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Permission; dismissal, dismission. Pl. اذنونه iẕn-ūnah. اذن آخستل iẕnāḵẖistal, verb trans. To take leave or permission. اذن ورکول iẕn war-kawul, verb trans. To permit, to dismiss, to order, to give permission.
original: s.m. (2nd) Permission; dismissal, dismission. Pl. اذنونه iẕn-ūnah. اذن آخستل iẕnāḵẖistal, verb trans. To take leave or permission. اذن ورکول iẕn war-kawul, verb trans. To permit, to dismiss, to order, to give permission.

\u0627\u0630\u0648\u0642\u0647.meaning: or ازوقه azū-ḳaʿh, s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of A ذوق), Food, provisions. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0630\u0648\u0642\u0647.original: اذوقه aẕū-ḳaʿh or ازوقه azū-ḳaʿh, s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of A ذوق), Food, provisions. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A fetter. Pl. ارونه arūnah. See پاي بند and اړ.
\u0627\u0631.original: ار ar, s.m. (2nd) A fetter. Pl. ارونه arūnah. See پاي بند and اړ.

\u0627\u0631\u0627\u0628\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A wheeled-carriage, a gun-carriage, a cart, a tumbril. Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.f. (3rd) A wheeled-carriage, a gun-carriage, a cart, a tumbril. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0631\u0627\u062e.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A rivulet, a brook, a linn, a sluice, a gush or rush of water. Pl. اراخونه arāḵẖ-ūnah.
\u0627\u0631\u0627\u062e.original: اراخ arāḵẖ, s.m. (2nd) A rivulet, a brook, a linn, a sluice, a gush or rush of water. Pl. اراخونه arāḵẖ-ūnah.

\u0627\u0631\u0627\u062f\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Wish, desire, inclination. Pl. ارادتونه irādatūnah. See following.
original: s.m. (2nd) Wish, desire, inclination. Pl. ارادتونه irādatūnah. See following.

\u0627\u0631\u0627\u062f\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Wish, desire, inclination, purpose, design, plan. Pl. يْ ey. اراده لرل irādaʿh laral, verb trans. To have or possess wish, desire, inclination, etc. اراده کول irādaʿh kawul, verb trans. To form a design, to make an attempt, to design, to plan.
original: s.f. (3rd) Wish, desire, inclination, purpose, design, plan. Pl. يْ ey. اراده لرل irādaʿh laral, verb trans. To have or possess wish, desire, inclination, etc. اراده کول irādaʿh kawul, verb trans. To form a design, to make an attempt, to design, to plan.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0633\u062a\u06a9\u06.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Preparation, decoration, ornament, arrangement, refinement. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0633\u062a\u06a9\u06.original: آراستکِي ārās-tagī, s.f. (3rd) Preparation, decoration, ornament, arrangement, refinement. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0647.meaning: adj. Adorned, dressed, prepared, embellished, improved. آراسته کول ārās-tah kawul, verb trans. To adorn, to decorate, to embellish.
\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0647.original: آراسته ārās-tah, adj. Adorned, dressed, prepared, embellished, improved. آراسته کول ārās-tah kawul, verb trans. To adorn, to decorate, to embellish.

\u0627\u0631\u0627\u0643.meaning: s.m. (6th) The name of a tree from which tooth-pickers are made. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) The name of a tree from which tooth-pickers are made. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Ease, rest, comfort, repose. Pl. آرامونه ārāmūnah. بي آرام be ārām, adj. Indisposed, ill at ease; (Fem.) بي آرامه be ārāmaʿh. دل آرام dil-ārām, A beloved object, as a son, etc. دل آرامه dil-ārāmaʿh, A sweetheart, a mistress. آرام مندل ārām mundal, verb trans. To recover, to obtain ease, rest, quiet, repose, etc. آراميدل ārāmedal, verb intrans. To be at ease, to become tranquil, quiet; to become comforted. آرامول ārām- awul, verb trans. To rest, to repose, to take rest. آرام ور کول ārām war-kawul, verb trans. To ease, to appease, to assuage, to relieve.
original: s.m. (2nd) Ease, rest, comfort, repose. Pl. آرامونه ārāmūnah. بي آرام be ārām, adj. Indisposed, ill at ease; (Fem.) بي آرامه be ārāmaʿh. دل آرام dil-ārām, A beloved object, as a son, etc. دل آرامه dil-ārāmaʿh, A sweetheart, a mistress. آرام مندل ārām mundal, verb trans. To recover, to obtain ease, rest, quiet, repose, etc. آراميدل ārāmedal, verb intrans. To be at ease, to become tranquil, quiet; to become comforted. آرامول ārām- awul, verb trans. To rest, to repose, to take rest. آرام ور کول ārām war-kawul, verb trans. To ease, to appease, to assuage, to relieve.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0645\u06ab\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A resting-place, a bed-chamber. Pl. آرامګاهونه ārām-gāhūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) A resting-place, a bed-chamber. Pl. آرامګاهونه ārām-gāhūnah.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0645\u064a.meaning: adj. Slothful, idle; a lover of ease. (Masc. and fem.)
\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0645\u064a.original: آرامي ārāmī, adj. Slothful, idle; a lover of ease. (Masc. and fem.)

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u064a\u0634.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Ornament, embellishment, dressing, preparation; equipage. Pl. آرايشونه ārā-īs̱ẖūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Ornament, embellishment, dressing, preparation; equipage. Pl. آرايشونه ārā-īs̱ẖūnah.

\u0622\u0631\u0627\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Adorning, embellishing. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: s.f. (3rd) Adorning, embellishing. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0627\u0631\u0628\u0627\u0628.meaning: possessors, masters (pl. of رب). 2. The chief, or head man of a village or ḵẖel amongst the Eastern Afg̠ẖāns. Pl. اربابان arbābān.
original: possessors, masters (pl. of رب). 2. The chief, or head man of a village or ḵẖel amongst the Eastern Afg̠ẖāns. Pl. اربابان arbābān.

\u0627\u0631\u0628\u0648\u0632.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A muzzle of wood or leather for a dog, calf, etc., to prevent biting or drinking. 2. The muzzle. Pl. اربوزونه ur-būzūnah. See تربوزک and تمبوزک.
\u0627\u0631\u0628\u0648\u0632.original: اربوز ur-būz, s.m. (2nd) A muzzle of wood or leather for a dog, calf, etc., to prevent biting or drinking. 2. The muzzle. Pl. اربوزونه ur-būzūnah. See تربوزک and تمبوزک.

\u0627\u0631\u062a.meaning: or arat, adj. Loose, open, wide, apart, free, unconfined; (Fem.) ارته artaʿh, or arataʿh. ارت واليَ arat-wālaey, s.m. (1st) Looseness, openness, width, freedom. Pl. واليِ wālī. ارتيدل arte-dal, or arate-dal, verb intrans. To become loosened, loose, open, relaxed, freed. Pres. ارتيږي aratej̱ẕī (W.), or ارتيګي arategī (E.); past ارت شه arat s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; fut. ارت به شي arat bah s̱ẖī, or به ؤ شی bah wu-s̱ẖī; imp. ارت شه arat s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; act. part. ارتيدونکيَ arate-dūnkaey, or ارتيدونيَ arate-dūnaey; past part. ارت arat, or ارت شويَ arat s̱ẖawaey; verb. n. ارتيدنه aratedanaʿh, or ارتيده aratedah.
\u0627\u0631\u062a.original: ارت art, or arat, adj. Loose, open, wide, apart, free, unconfined; (Fem.) ارته artaʿh, or arataʿh. ارت واليَ arat-wālaey, s.m. (1st) Looseness, openness, width, freedom. Pl. واليِ wālī. ارتيدل arte-dal, or arate-dal, verb intrans. To become loosened, loose, open, relaxed, freed. Pres. ارتيږي aratej̱ẕī (W.), or ارتيګي arategī (E.); past ارت شه arat s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; fut. ارت به شي arat bah s̱ẖī, or به ؤ شی bah wu-s̱ẖī; imp. ارت شه arat s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; act. part. ارتيدونکيَ arate-dūnkaey, or ارتيدونيَ arate-dūnaey; past part. ارت arat, or ارت شويَ arat s̱ẖawaey; verb. n. ارتيدنه aratedanaʿh, or ارتيده aratedah.

\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0648\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To disengage, to unloose, to relax, to untie, to open, to unbind, to render unconfined, to free, to set free. Pres. ارتوي aratawī; past. ارت کړ arat kaṟṟ, or ؤ کړ wu-kaṟṟ; fut. ارت به کړي arat bah kṟṟī, or به ؤ کړي bah wu-kṟṟī; imp. ارت کړه arat kṟṟah, or ؤ کړه wu-kṟṟah; act. part. ارتوونکيَ aratawūnkaey, or ارتوونيَ aratawūnaey; past part. ارت کړيَ arat kaṟṟaey; verb. n. ارتونه aratawunaʿh.
\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0648\u0644.original: ارتول aratawul, verb trans. To disengage, to unloose, to relax, to untie, to open, to unbind, to render unconfined, to free, to set free. Pres. ارتوي aratawī; past. ارت کړ arat kaṟṟ, or ؤ کړ wu-kaṟṟ; fut. ارت به کړي arat bah kṟṟī, or به ؤ کړي bah wu-kṟṟī; imp. ارت کړه arat kṟṟah, or ؤ کړه wu-kṟṟah; act. part. ارتوونکيَ aratawūnkaey, or ارتوونيَ aratawūnaey; past part. ارت کړيَ arat kaṟṟaey; verb. n. ارتونه aratawunaʿh.

\u069a\u067e\u0647.meaning: ḵ́ẖpaʿh artaʿh, The first visit of a lover to the house of his betrothed (lit. ʻfoot-relaxedʼ); or پښه ارته pś̱ẖaʿh arataʿh (W.). ښپه ارته کول or پښه ḵ́ẖpaʿh, or pś̱ẖaʿh artah, or arataʿh kawul, verb trans. To visit a betrothed female (the lover). ارتيْ ښپيْ artey ḵ́ẖpey, or ارتيْ پښيْ aratey pś̱ẖey; adj. Bow or bandy-legs, knock-kneed.
\u069a\u067e\u0647.original: ښپه ارته ḵ́ẖpaʿh artaʿh, The first visit of a lover to the house of his betrothed (lit. ʻfoot-relaxedʼ); or پښه ارته pś̱ẖaʿh arataʿh (W.). ښپه ارته کول or پښه ḵ́ẖpaʿh, or pś̱ẖaʿh artah, or arataʿh kawul, verb trans. To visit a betrothed female (the lover). ارتيْ ښپيْ artey ḵ́ẖpey, or ارتيْ پښيْ aratey pś̱ẖey; adj. Bow or bandy-legs, knock-kneed.

\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To break wind, to fart. Pres. ارتي aratī, or ارزي arazī; past وارت wā-rat; fut. ؤ به ارتي wu bah aratī, or ارزي arazī; imp. وارزه wā-razah; act. part. ارتونکيَ aratūnkaey, or ارتونيَ aratūnaey; past part. ارتليَ aratalaey; verb. n. ارتنه aratanaʿh.
\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0644.original: ارتل aratal, verb trans. To break wind, to fart. Pres. ارتي aratī, or ارزي arazī; past وارت wā-rat; fut. ؤ به ارتي wu bah aratī, or ارزي arazī; imp. وارزه wā-razah; act. part. ارتونکيَ aratūnkaey, or ارتونيَ aratūnaey; past part. ارتليَ aratalaey; verb. n. ارتنه aratanaʿh.

\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A wife, a woman, a female. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0631\u062a\u0646\u0647.original: ارتنه artinaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A wife, a woman, a female. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0631\u062a\u064a\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Pl. يْ ey. Same as preceding. See ښڅه and ماندينه
\u0627\u0631\u062a\u064a\u0646\u0647.original: ارتينه ar-tīnaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Pl. يْ ey. Same as preceding. See ښڅه and ماندينه

\u0627\u0631\u062c\u0644.meaning: ar-jal-barjal, adj. Entangled, entrapped (as a bird in a net), noosed; (Fem.) ارجل برجله ar-jal-bar-jalaʿh.
\u0627\u0631\u062c\u0644.original: ارجل برجل ar-jal-barjal, adj. Entangled, entrapped (as a bird in a net), noosed; (Fem.) ارجل برجله ar-jal-bar-jalaʿh.

\u0622\u0631\u062e\u069a.meaning: (E.), s.m. (2nd) A gasping or guggling noise produced in the throat when crying violently or sobbing, a paroxysm or outburst of grief, convulsive weeping or sobbing. Pl. آرخښونه ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ-ūnah. آرخښ کول ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ kawul, verb trans., or آرخښ ښکل ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ ḵ́ẖʿkul, verb trans. To sob or cry convulsively or with violence.
\u0622\u0631\u062e\u069a.original: آرخښ ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ (E.), s.m. (2nd) A gasping or guggling noise produced in the throat when crying violently or sobbing, a paroxysm or outburst of grief, convulsive weeping or sobbing. Pl. آرخښونه ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ-ūnah. آرخښ کول ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ kawul, verb trans., or آرخښ ښکل ārḵẖaḵ́ẖ ḵ́ẖʿkul, verb trans. To sob or cry convulsively or with violence.

\u0627\u0631\u0632\u0627\u0646.meaning: adj. Cheap, not dear, inexpensive; (Fem.) ارزانه ar-zānaʿh. ارزان کيدل ar-zān kedal, verb intrans. To become cheap, to lessen or grow less or low in price. ارزان کول ar-zān kawul, verb trans. To cheapen, to make or render cheap or inexpensive. See وله ,لوله and ول or ويل.
original: adj. Cheap, not dear, inexpensive; (Fem.) ارزانه ar-zānaʿh. ارزان کيدل ar-zān kedal, verb intrans. To become cheap, to lessen or grow less or low in price. ارزان کول ar-zān kawul, verb trans. To cheapen, to make or render cheap or inexpensive. See وله ,لوله and ول or ويل.

\u0627\u0631\u0632\u0627\u0646\u064a.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Cheapness, lowness of price. Pl. ئِي aʿī. See ویل.
original: s.f. (3rd) Cheapness, lowness of price. Pl. ئِي aʿī. See ویل.

\u0622\u0631\u0632\u0648.meaning: s.m. (9th) Wish, desire, hope, distress, want. Sing. and Pl. آرزومند ār-zū-mand, or من man; adj. Desirous, longing, wanting; (Fem.) آرزومنده ār-zū-mandaʿh, or منه manaʿh. آرزو لرل ār-zū laral, verb trans. To have a wish, want, or hope, to require, to want.
original: s.m. (9th) Wish, desire, hope, distress, want. Sing. and Pl. آرزومند ār-zū-mand, or من man; adj. Desirous, longing, wanting; (Fem.) آرزومنده ār-zū-mandaʿh, or منه manaʿh. آرزو لرل ār-zū laral, verb trans. To have a wish, want, or hope, to require, to want.

\u0622\u0631\u0632\u0648\u0645\u0646\u06.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Desire, longing, hankering. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: s.f. (3rd) Desire, longing, hankering. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0627\u0631\u0632\u064a\u062f\u0644.meaning: verb intrans. To be worth, to fetch, to bring. Pres. ارزيږي ar-zej̱ẕī (W.), or ارزيګي ar-zegī (E.); past ؤ ارزيده wu-ar-zedah, or ؤ ارزيدَ wu-ar-zeda; fut. ؤ به ارزيږي wu bah ar-zej̱ẕī, or ارزيګي ar-zegī; imp. ؤ ارزيږه wu-ar-zej̱ẕah, or ؤ ارزيګه wu-ar-zegah; act. part. ارزيدونکيَar-zedūnkaey, or ارزيدونيَ ar-zedūnaey; past part. ارزيدليَ ar-zedalaey; verb. n. ارزيدنه ar-zedanaʿh, or ارزيده ar-zedah.
\u0627\u0631\u0632\u064a\u062f\u0644.original: ارزيدل ar-zedal, verb intrans. To be worth, to fetch, to bring. Pres. ارزيږي ar-zej̱ẕī (W.), or ارزيګي ar-zegī (E.); past ؤ ارزيده wu-ar-zedah, or ؤ ارزيدَ wu-ar-zeda; fut. ؤ به ارزيږي wu bah ar-zej̱ẕī, or ارزيګي ar-zegī; imp. ؤ ارزيږه wu-ar-zej̱ẕah, or ؤ ارزيګه wu-ar-zegah; act. part. ارزيدونکيَar-zedūnkaey, or ارزيدونيَ ar-zedūnaey; past part. ارزيدليَ ar-zedalaey; verb. n. ارزيدنه ar-zedanaʿh, or ارزيده ar-zedah.

\u0627\u0631\u0696\u0645\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) (W.), A gape, a yawn; (E.) A belch, eructation. Pl. يِِ ī. ارږميَ کول ar-j̱ẕamaey kawul, verb trans. To yawn, to gape. See ارګمي.
\u0627\u0631\u0696\u0645\u064a.original: ارږميَ ar-j̱ẕamaey, s.m. (1st) (W.), A gape, a yawn; (E.) A belch, eructation. Pl. يِِ ī. ارږميَ کول ar-j̱ẕamaey kawul, verb trans. To yawn, to gape. See ارګمي.

\u0627\u0631\u0696\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) (W.), A belch, eructation. Pl. يِ ī. ارږي يستل ar-j̱ẕaey yas-tal, or کول kawul, verb trans. To belch. See ارګي and ټيغ.
\u0627\u0631\u0696\u064a.original: ارږيََ ar-j̱ẕaey, s.m. (1st) (W.), A belch, eructation. Pl. يِ ī. ارږي يستل ar-j̱ẕaey yas-tal, or کول kawul, verb trans. To belch. See ارګي and ټيغ.

\u0627\u0631\u0633\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (9th) The act of sending, mission, remittance. Sing. and Pl. ارسال کول ir-sāl kawul, verb trans. To send, to transmit, to remit.
original: s.m. (9th) The act of sending, mission, remittance. Sing. and Pl. ارسال کول ir-sāl kawul, verb trans. To send, to transmit, to remit.

\u0622\u0631\u0633\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (6th) (HI. ارسي) A mirror, a small mirror for the thumb worn by women. Sing. and Pl.
\u0622\u0631\u0633\u0626\u064a.original: آرسئِي ār-saʿī, s.f. (6th) (HI. ارسي) A mirror, a small mirror for the thumb worn by women. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0631\u0634\u0627\u062f.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Direction, command, order. Pl. ارشادونه ir-s̱ẖādūnah. ارشاد کول ir-s̱ẖād kawul, verb trans. To command, to order, to direct.
original: s.m. (2nd) Direction, command, order. Pl. ارشادونه ir-s̱ẖādūnah. ارشاد کول ir-s̱ẖād kawul, verb trans. To command, to order, to direct.

\u0627\u0631\u0636.meaning: s.m. (9th) The earth, a portion of land. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) The earth, a portion of land. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0646\u062f.meaning: s.m. (5th) A large knuckle-bone used in a game. Pl. ارغندان ar-g̠ẖundān. See بجل and ټکه ارغند
\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0646\u062f.original: ارغند ar-g̠ẖund, s.m. (5th) A large knuckle-bone used in a game. Pl. ارغندان ar-g̠ẖundān. See بجل and ټکه ارغند

\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0648\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (6th) The name of a plant whose flowers are of a beautiful red colour. Sing. and Pl. Also written ارغون arg̠ẖwan.
original: s.m. (6th) The name of a plant whose flowers are of a beautiful red colour. Sing. and Pl. Also written ارغون arg̠ẖwan.

\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0648\u0627\u0646\u06.meaning: adj. Of a red or purple colour.
original: adj. Of a red or purple colour.

\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0648\u0645\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A male kid. Pl. يِ ī; ارغومئ ur-g̠ẖūmaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female kid. Sing. and Pl. See ورغومي.
\u0627\u0631\u063a\u0648\u0645\u064a.original: ارغوميَ ur-g̠ẖūmaey, s.m. (1st) A male kid. Pl. يِ ī; ارغومئ ur-g̠ẖūmaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female kid. Sing. and Pl. See ورغومي.

\u0627\u0631\u06a9\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.pl. (of رکن) Pillars, props, supports. ارکان دولت ar-kān-i-daw-lat, Nobles, grandees, ministers of state.
original: s.pl. (of رکن) Pillars, props, supports. ارکان دولت ar-kān-i-daw-lat, Nobles, grandees, ministers of state.

\u0627\u0631\u06ab\u0645\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A gape, a yawn. Pl. يِ ī. See ارږمَي.
\u0627\u0631\u06ab\u0645\u064a.original: ارګمَي ar-gamaey, s.m. (1st) A gape, a yawn. Pl. يِ ī. See ارږمَي.

\u0627\u0631\u06ab\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) (E.) A belch, eructation. Pl. يِ ī. ارګيَ يستل ar-gaey yastal, or کول kawul, verb trans. To belch. See ارږي.
\u0627\u0631\u06ab\u064a.original: ارګيَ ar-gaey, s.m. (1st) (E.) A belch, eructation. Pl. يِ ī. ارګيَ يستل ar-gaey yastal, or کول kawul, verb trans. To belch. See ارږي.

\u0627\u0631\u0645\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Sorrow, regret, longing. 2. Desire, wish, inclination. 3. Also used as an interjection, Alas! sorrow! Pl. ارمانونه ar-mānūnah. ارمان کول ar-mān kawul, verb trans. To regret, to sorrow. 2. To desire, to long after.
original: s.m. (2nd) Sorrow, regret, longing. 2. Desire, wish, inclination. 3. Also used as an interjection, Alas! sorrow! Pl. ارمانونه ar-mānūnah. ارمان کول ar-mān kawul, verb trans. To regret, to sorrow. 2. To desire, to long after.

\u0627\u0631\u0648\u062a\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A female, a woman, a wife. Pl. يْ ey. (T اروت).
\u0627\u0631\u0648\u062a\u0647.original: اروته ar-wataʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female, a woman, a wife. Pl. يْ ey. (T اروت).

\u0622\u0631\u0648\u064a\u062f\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To hear, to listen, to hearken. Pres. آروي ār-wī; past وارويده wār-wedah, or وارويدَ wār-weda; fut. وا به روي wā bah rwī; imp. واروه wār-wah; act. part. آرويدونکيَ ār-wedūnkaey, or آرويدونيَ ār-wedūnaey; past part. آرويدليَ ār-wedalaey; verb. n. آرويدنه ār-wedanaʿh, or آرويده ār-wedah. آروول ār-wawul, verb trans. (caus.) To cause to hear, to make hear. Pres. آرووي ār-wawī; past وارواوه wār-wāwuh, or وارواوو wār-wāwo; fut. وا به رووي wā bah rawawī, or ؤ به آرووي wu bah ār-wawī; imp. وارووه wār- wawah; act. part. آرووونکيَ ār-wawūnkaey, or آرووونيَ ār-wawūnaey; past part. آرووليَ ār-wawulaey; verb. n. آروونه ār-wawunaʿh.
\u0622\u0631\u0648\u064a\u062f\u0644.original: آرويدل ār-wedal, verb trans. To hear, to listen, to hearken. Pres. آروي ār-wī; past وارويده wār-wedah, or وارويدَ wār-weda; fut. وا به روي wā bah rwī; imp. واروه wār-wah; act. part. آرويدونکيَ ār-wedūnkaey, or آرويدونيَ ār-wedūnaey; past part. آرويدليَ ār-wedalaey; verb. n. آرويدنه ār-wedanaʿh, or آرويده ār-wedah. آروول ār-wawul, verb trans. (caus.) To cause to hear, to make hear. Pres. آرووي ār-wawī; past وارواوه wār-wāwuh, or وارواوو wār-wāwo; fut. وا به رووي wā bah rawawī, or ؤ به آرووي wu bah ār-wawī; imp. وارووه wār- wawah; act. part. آرووونکيَ ār-wawūnkaey, or آرووونيَ ār-wawūnaey; past part. آرووليَ ār-wawulaey; verb. n. آروونه ār-wawunaʿh.

\u0627\u0631\u0647.meaning: s.m. (6th) Clouds. Sing. and Pl. See اوره.
\u0627\u0631\u0647.original: اره urah, s.m. (6th) Clouds. Sing. and Pl. See اوره.

\u0622\u0631\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Foundation, basis. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0622\u0631\u0647.original: آره ārah, s.f. (3rd) Foundation, basis. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0631\u0647\u067c.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A well with a Persian wheel for drawing water. Pl. ارهټونه arhaṯṯūnah. Also رهټ, which see. (HI. ارهٿ).
\u0627\u0631\u0647\u067c.original: ارهټ ar-haṯṯ, s.m. (2nd) A well with a Persian wheel for drawing water. Pl. ارهټونه arhaṯṯūnah. Also رهټ, which see. (HI. ارهٿ).

\u0627\u0631\u0647\u0631.meaning: s.m. (6th) A species of pulse (Cytisus cajan). Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) A species of pulse (Cytisus cajan). Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0631\u0647\u0631\u0648.meaning: s.m. (6th) Same as preceding. Sing and Pl.
\u0627\u0631\u0647\u0631\u0648.original: ارهرو ar-harū, s.m. (6th) Same as preceding. Sing and Pl.

\u0627\u0631\u0647\u0646\u0689.meaning: s.m. (6th) The Palma Christi, or castor-oil tree. Sing. and Pl.; or ارهنډه ar-hanḏḏaʿh, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey. (S ارنڐ).
\u0627\u0631\u0647\u0646\u0689.original: ارهنډ ar-hanḏḏ, s.m. (6th) The Palma Christi, or castor-oil tree. Sing. and Pl.; or ارهنډه ar-hanḏḏaʿh, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey. (S ارنڐ).

\u0627\u0631\u06cc\u0685\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A cloud. Pl. يْ ey. See اوریڅه.
\u0627\u0631\u06cc\u0685\u0647.original: اریڅه ur-yaḏẕaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A cloud. Pl. يْ ey. See اوریڅه.

\u0622\u0693.meaning: or اړ aṟṟ, s.m. (2nd) Hinderance, stoppage, prevention. 2. Difficulty, embarrassment, perplexity, dilemma. 3. A screen, shelter, concealment, protection. 4. A fetter, a manacle. Pl. آړونه āṟṟūnah, or اړونه aṟṟūnah. 5. adj. Obstructed, hindered, stopped, clogged, embarrassed, perplexed. (Fem.) آړه āṟṟaʿh, or اړه aṟṟaʿh. آړ آخستل āṟṟ āḵẖistal, verb trans. To lie in wait, to lie in ambush or concealment (lit. ʻto take concealment.ʼ) آړيدل āṟṟedal, verb intrans. To become obstructed, hindered, stopped, checked, clogged, impeded. 2. To become embarrassed, perplexed, to fall into a dilemma. 3. To be screened, protected, etc. Pres. آړيړي āṟṟej̱ẕī (W.), or آړيګي āṟṟegī (E.); past آړشه āṟṟ s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; fut. آړ به شي āṟṟ bah s̱ẖī, or به ؤ شي bah wu-s̱ẖī; imp. آړشه āṟṟ shah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; act. part. آړيدونکيَ āṟṟedūnkaey, or آړيدونيَ āṟṟedūnaey; past part. آړشويَ āṟṟ s̱ẖawaey; verb. n. آړيدنه āṟṟedanaʿh, or آړيده āṟṟedah. آړول āṟṟawul, verb trans. To impede, to hinder, to obstruct, to clog, check, retard, to oppose. 2. To embarrass, to perplex, to place in a dilemma. Pres. آړوي āṟṟawī; past آړکړ āṟṟ kaṟṟ, or ؤ کړ wu-kaṟṟ; fut. آړ به کړي āṟṟ bah kṟṟī, or به ؤ کړي bah wu-kṟṟī; imp. آړ کړه āṟṟ kṟṟah, or ؤ کړه wu-kṟṟah; act. part. آړوونکيَ āṟṟawūnkaey, or آړوونیَ āṟṟawūnaey; past part. آړ کړيَ āṟṟ kaṟṟaey; verb. n. آړونه āṟṟawunaʿh. (HI. آڙ). See اړه.
\u0622\u0693.original: آړ āṟṟ, or اړ aṟṟ, s.m. (2nd) Hinderance, stoppage, prevention. 2. Difficulty, embarrassment, perplexity, dilemma. 3. A screen, shelter, concealment, protection. 4. A fetter, a manacle. Pl. آړونه āṟṟūnah, or اړونه aṟṟūnah. 5. adj. Obstructed, hindered, stopped, clogged, embarrassed, perplexed. (Fem.) آړه āṟṟaʿh, or اړه aṟṟaʿh. آړ آخستل āṟṟ āḵẖistal, verb trans. To lie in wait, to lie in ambush or concealment (lit. ʻto take concealment.ʼ) آړيدل āṟṟedal, verb intrans. To become obstructed, hindered, stopped, checked, clogged, impeded. 2. To become embarrassed, perplexed, to fall into a dilemma. 3. To be screened, protected, etc. Pres. آړيړي āṟṟej̱ẕī (W.), or آړيګي āṟṟegī (E.); past آړشه āṟṟ s̱ẖah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; fut. آړ به شي āṟṟ bah s̱ẖī, or به ؤ شي bah wu-s̱ẖī; imp. آړشه āṟṟ shah, or ؤ شه wu-s̱ẖah; act. part. آړيدونکيَ āṟṟedūnkaey, or آړيدونيَ āṟṟedūnaey; past part. آړشويَ āṟṟ s̱ẖawaey; verb. n. آړيدنه āṟṟedanaʿh, or آړيده āṟṟedah. آړول āṟṟawul, verb trans. To impede, to hinder, to obstruct, to clog, check, retard, to oppose. 2. To embarrass, to perplex, to place in a dilemma. Pres. آړوي āṟṟawī; past آړکړ āṟṟ kaṟṟ, or ؤ کړ wu-kaṟṟ; fut. آړ به کړي āṟṟ bah kṟṟī, or به ؤ کړي bah wu-kṟṟī; imp. آړ کړه āṟṟ kṟṟah, or ؤ کړه wu-kṟṟah; act. part. آړوونکيَ āṟṟawūnkaey, or آړوونیَ āṟṟawūnaey; past part. آړ کړيَ āṟṟ kaṟṟaey; verb. n. آړونه āṟṟawunaʿh. (HI. آڙ). See اړه.

\u0627\u0693\u062e.meaning: or aṟṟaḵẖ, s.m. (2nd) The side, the armpit. Pl. اړخونه aṟṟḵẖūnah, or aṟṟaḵẖūnah. See اړخ په اړخ .څنګ aṟṟḵẖ pah aṟṟḵẖ, or aṟṟaḵẖ pah aṟṟaḵẖ, Side by side, close to each other (as soldiers in their ranks, etc.)
\u0627\u0693\u062e.original: اړخ aṟṟḵẖ, or aṟṟaḵẖ, s.m. (2nd) The side, the armpit. Pl. اړخونه aṟṟḵẖūnah, or aṟṟaḵẖūnah. See اړخ په اړخ .څنګ aṟṟḵẖ pah aṟṟḵẖ, or aṟṟaḵẖ pah aṟṟaḵẖ, Side by side, close to each other (as soldiers in their ranks, etc.)

\u0627\u0693\u0645.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A prop, a bar of wood placed against a door, a support, a pillar. Pl. اړمونه aṟṟamūnah. اړم کول aṟṟam kawul, verb trans. To prop, to support. See ټمبه.
\u0627\u0693\u0645.original: اړم aṟṟam, s.m. (2nd) A prop, a bar of wood placed against a door, a support, a pillar. Pl. اړمونه aṟṟamūnah. اړم کول aṟṟam kawul, verb trans. To prop, to support. See ټمبه.

\u0627\u0693\u0645\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) (dim. of above) A small prop, a small bar of wood placed against a door or shutter. Pl. يِِ ī.
\u0627\u0693\u0645\u064a.original: اړميَ aṟṟamaey, s.m. (1st) (dim. of above) A small prop, a small bar of wood placed against a door or shutter. Pl. يِِ ī.

\u0627\u0693\u0648\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To turn, to turn over, to capsize, to tilt over, to overturn or overset, to pervert. Pres. اړوي aṟṟawī; past واړاوه wāṟṟāwuh, or واړاوو wāṟṟāwo; fut. وا به ړوي wā bah ṟṟwī; imp. واړوه wāṟṟawah; act. part. اړوونکيَ aṟṟawūnkaey, or اړوونيَ aṟṟawūnaey; past. part. اړوليَ aṟṟawulaey; verb. n. اړونه aṟṟawunaʿh.
\u0627\u0693\u0648\u0644.original: اړول aṟṟawul, verb trans. To turn, to turn over, to capsize, to tilt over, to overturn or overset, to pervert. Pres. اړوي aṟṟawī; past واړاوه wāṟṟāwuh, or واړاوو wāṟṟāwo; fut. وا به ړوي wā bah ṟṟwī; imp. واړوه wāṟṟawah; act. part. اړوونکيَ aṟṟawūnkaey, or اړوونيَ aṟṟawūnaey; past. part. اړوليَ aṟṟawulaey; verb. n. اړونه aṟṟawunaʿh.

\u0627\u0693\u0648\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. (past part.) Inverted, overturned, capsized, upside down, tilted over, perverted, turned; (Fem.) اړول ِ aṟṟawuli. Pl. (masc. and fem.) يِ ī; اړوليَ بخت aṟṟawulaey baḵẖt, Inverted fortune, misfortune, bad luck. اړولي چاريْ aṟṟawūlī c̱ẖārey, Confused or unsettled actions. 2. Improper or fruitless actions. اړولي خبريْ aṟṟawulī ḵẖa- barey, Confused or incoherent words, or words spoken in anger. ښپه اړول ḵ́ẖpaʿh aṟṟawul (E.), or پښه اړول pś̱ẖaʿh aṟṟawul (W.) To sit cross-legged, to mount on horseback.
\u0627\u0693\u0648\u0644\u064a.original: اړوليَِ aṟṟawulaey, adj. (past part.) Inverted, overturned, capsized, upside down, tilted over, perverted, turned; (Fem.) اړول ِ aṟṟawuli. Pl. (masc. and fem.) يِ ī; اړوليَ بخت aṟṟawulaey baḵẖt, Inverted fortune, misfortune, bad luck. اړولي چاريْ aṟṟawūlī c̱ẖārey, Confused or unsettled actions. 2. Improper or fruitless actions. اړولي خبريْ aṟṟawulī ḵẖa- barey, Confused or incoherent words, or words spoken in anger. ښپه اړول ḵ́ẖpaʿh aṟṟawul (E.), or پښه اړول pś̱ẖaʿh aṟṟawul (W.) To sit cross-legged, to mount on horseback.

\u0627\u0693\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Obstacle, hindrance, impediment, stop, prevention. 2. A screen, shelter, concealment. 2. Adj. (fem. of اړ), Impeded, obstructed, stopped, clogged, hindered. Pl. ْي ey.
\u0627\u0693\u0647.original: اړه aṟṟaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Obstacle, hindrance, impediment, stop, prevention. 2. A screen, shelter, concealment. 2. Adj. (fem. of اړ), Impeded, obstructed, stopped, clogged, hindered. Pl. ْي ey.

\u0627\u0693\u064a\u0693\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (6th) The small pieces of wood inserted between the ropes over a Persian wheel, and to which the earthen waterpots are fastened. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0693\u064a\u0693\u0626\u064a.original: اړيړئِي aṟṟeṟṟaʿī, s.f. (6th) The small pieces of wood inserted between the ropes over a Persian wheel, and to which the earthen waterpots are fastened. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0693\u064a\u06a9\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A bar of wood for a door or gate, a pole, a prop, a support. 2. (W.) Perplexity, plague, difficulty, embarrassment. Pl. ي ī.
\u0627\u0693\u064a\u06a9\u064a.original: اړيکيَ aṟṟekaey, s.m. (1st) A bar of wood for a door or gate, a pole, a prop, a support. 2. (W.) Perplexity, plague, difficulty, embarrassment. Pl. ي ī.

\u0622\u0632.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Desire, love, passion, lust, avidity, avarice, covetousness. Pl. آزونه āzūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Desire, love, passion, lust, avidity, avarice, covetousness. Pl. آزونه āzūnah.

\u0622\u0632\u0627\u062f.meaning: adj. Free, liberated. 2. Lonely, solitary; (Fem.) آزاده āzādaʿh. آزاديدل āzādedal, verb intrans. To be set free, manumitted, liberated, emancipated. 2. To become lonely. آزادول āzādawul, verb trans. To free, to liberate, to deliver, to set at liberty, to emancipate, to manumit.
original: adj. Free, liberated. 2. Lonely, solitary; (Fem.) آزاده āzādaʿh. آزاديدل āzādedal, verb intrans. To be set free, manumitted, liberated, emancipated. 2. To become lonely. آزادول āzādawul, verb trans. To free, to liberate, to deliver, to set at liberty, to emancipate, to manumit.

\u0622\u0632\u0627\u062f\u0647.meaning: adj. Free, noble, independent. (Masc. and Fem.); Pl. آزاده ګان āzādahgān; (Fem.) pl. آزادګان ِ āzādah-gāni.
original: adj. Free, noble, independent. (Masc. and Fem.); Pl. آزاده ګان āzādahgān; (Fem.) pl. آزادګان ِ āzādah-gāni.

\u0622\u0632\u0627\u062f\u06ab\u064a.meaning: or آزادي azādī, s.f. (3rd) Freedom, independence, manumission, deliverance, freedom, emancipation. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: or آزادي azādī, s.f. (3rd) Freedom, independence, manumission, deliverance, freedom, emancipation. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0622\u0632\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Sickness, disorder, disease; trouble, affliction, injury. Pl. آزارونه āzārūnah. آزار رسول āzār rasawul, verb trans. To injure, to afflict, to torture. آزاريدل āzāredal, or آزار کيدل āzār kedal, verb intrans. To be injured, troubled, afflicted. آزار کول āzār kawul, or آزارول āzārawul, verb trans. To afflict, to injure, to torture, to trouble.
original: s.m. (2nd) Sickness, disorder, disease; trouble, affliction, injury. Pl. آزارونه āzārūnah. آزار رسول āzār rasawul, verb trans. To injure, to afflict, to torture. آزاريدل āzāredal, or آزار کيدل āzār kedal, verb intrans. To be injured, troubled, afflicted. آزار کول āzār kawul, or آزارول āzārawul, verb trans. To afflict, to injure, to torture, to trouble.

\u0622\u0632\u0627\u0631\u064a.meaning: adj. Sick, diseased, afflicted, troubled. 2. A sick person.
original: adj. Sick, diseased, afflicted, troubled. 2. A sick person.

\u0627\u0632\u0628\u06a9.meaning: s.m. (5th) The name of a tribe inhabiting the countries about Bālḵẖ. 2. A male of the tribe. Pl. ازبکان uz-bakān. ازبکه az-bakaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above tribe. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0632\u0628\u06a9.original: ازبک uz-bak, s.m. (5th) The name of a tribe inhabiting the countries about Bālḵẖ. 2. A male of the tribe. Pl. ازبکان uz-bakān. ازبکه az-bakaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female of the above tribe. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0622\u0632\u0631\u062f\u0647.meaning: adj. Afflicted, sad, vexed, dispirited, displeased, weary. آزرده کيدل āzur-dah kedal, verb trans. To become sad, dispirited, uneasy. آزرده کول āzur-dah kawul, verb trans. To vex, to displease, to afflict. آزرده خاطر āzur-dah ḵẖāt̤ir, or آرزده دل āzur-dah dil, adj. Troubled in mind, disgusted, vexed; (Fem.) آزرده خاطره āzurdaʿh ḵẖāt̤iraʿh, or آزرده دله āzurdaʿh dilaʿh.
original: adj. Afflicted, sad, vexed, dispirited, displeased, weary. آزرده کيدل āzur-dah kedal, verb trans. To become sad, dispirited, uneasy. آزرده کول āzur-dah kawul, verb trans. To vex, to displease, to afflict. آزرده خاطر āzur-dah ḵẖāt̤ir, or آرزده دل āzur-dah dil, adj. Troubled in mind, disgusted, vexed; (Fem.) آزرده خاطره āzurdaʿh ḵẖāt̤iraʿh, or آزرده دله āzurdaʿh dilaʿh.

\u0627\u0632\u063a\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A thorn. Pl. يِ ī. See اغزي.
\u0627\u0632\u063a\u064a.original: ازغيَ az-g̠ẖaey, s.m. (1st) A thorn. Pl. يِ ī. See اغزي.

\u0627\u0632\u063a\u0646.meaning: adj. Thorny, prickly; (Fem.) ازغنه az-g̠ẖanaʿh. See اغزن.
\u0627\u0632\u063a\u0646.original: ازغن az-g̠ẖan, adj. Thorny, prickly; (Fem.) ازغنه az-g̠ẖanaʿh. See اغزن.

\u0627\u0632\u0644.meaning: s.m. (9th) Eternity, without beginning. Sing. and Pl. ازل و ابد azal-o-abad, Without beginning and without end. له ازل نه lah azal nah, or له ازلَ lah azala, From all eternity. پوري or ترازلَ پور ِ tar azala pori or porī, Eternally, to all eternity, everlastingly.
original: s.m. (9th) Eternity, without beginning. Sing. and Pl. ازل و ابد azal-o-abad, Without beginning and without end. له ازل نه lah azal nah, or له ازلَ lah azala, From all eternity. پوري or ترازلَ پور ِ tar azala pori or porī, Eternally, to all eternity, everlastingly.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0627\u064a\u0634.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Trial, proof, essay, examination, experiment. 2. Temptation. Pl. آزمايشونه az-māʿīs̱ẖūnah. آرمايش کول āz-māʿīs̱ẖ kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove, to essay, to examine.
original: s.m. (2nd) Trial, proof, essay, examination, experiment. 2. Temptation. Pl. آزمايشونه az-māʿīs̱ẖūnah. آرمايش کول āz-māʿīs̱ẖ kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove, to essay, to examine.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0627\u06cc\u069a\u06.meaning: (E.), or āzmāʿīś̱ẖt (W.) Trial, essay, etc. Pl. آزمایښتونه āz-māʿīḵ́ẖtūnah, or āzmāʿīś̱ẖtūnah. آزمايښت کول āz-māʿīḵ́ẖt, or āz-māʿīś̱ẖt kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove. See preceding.
\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0627\u06cc\u069a\u06.original: آزمایښت āz-māʿīḵ́ẖt (E.), or āzmāʿīś̱ẖt (W.) Trial, essay, etc. Pl. آزمایښتونه āz-māʿīḵ́ẖtūnah, or āzmāʿīś̱ẖtūnah. آزمايښت کول āz-māʿīḵ́ẖt, or āz-māʿīś̱ẖt kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove. See preceding.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0627\u064a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To prove, to examine, to try, to investigate, to essay. 2. To tempt. Pres. آزمابي āz-mā-yī; past ؤ آزمايه wu-āz-mā-yah; fut. ؤ به آزمايي wu bah āz-mā-yī; imp. ؤ آزمايه wu-āz-mā-yah; act. part. آزمايونکيَ āz-māyūnkaey, or آزمايونيَ āz-māyūnaey; past part. آزمايليَ āz-māyalaey; verb n. آزماينه āz-māyanaʿh.
\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0627\u064a\u0644.original: آزمايل āz-mā-yil, verb trans. To prove, to examine, to try, to investigate, to essay. 2. To tempt. Pres. آزمابي āz-mā-yī; past ؤ آزمايه wu-āz-mā-yah; fut. ؤ به آزمايي wu bah āz-mā-yī; imp. ؤ آزمايه wu-āz-mā-yah; act. part. آزمايونکيَ āz-māyūnkaey, or آزمايونيَ āz-māyūnaey; past part. آزمايليَ āz-māyalaey; verb n. آزماينه āz-māyanaʿh.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0648\u062f\u0647.meaning: adj. Tried, proved, examined; experienced, veteran. آزموده کول āz-mūdah kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove, to examine. آزموده کار āz-mūdah-kār, adj. Experienced in business; (Fem.) آزموده کاره āz-mūdah-kāraʿh.
original: adj. Tried, proved, examined; experienced, veteran. آزموده کول āz-mūdah kawul, verb trans. To try, to prove, to examine. آزموده کار āz-mūdah-kār, adj. Experienced in business; (Fem.) آزموده کاره āz-mūdah-kāraʿh.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0648\u064a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. (W.) To try, to prove, to examine, to essay. See آزمايل and change ا for و for inflexions.
\u0622\u0632\u0645\u0648\u064a\u0644.original: آزمويل āz-mo-yal, verb trans. (W.) To try, to prove, to examine, to essay. See آزمايل and change ا for و for inflexions.

\u0622\u0632\u0645\u064a\u0644.original: آزميل āz-mayil, verb trans. See آزمايل.

\u0627\u0698\u062f\u0647\u0627.meaning: s.m. (6th) A large snake, a dragon, a sea-serpent. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) A large snake, a dragon, a sea-serpent. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0698\u062f\u0647\u0627\u062a.meaning: s.m. (6th) The name of a mixed metal, bell-metal or brass. Sing. and Pl. See هژدات.
original: s.m. (6th) The name of a mixed metal, bell-metal or brass. Sing. and Pl. See هژدات.

\u0627\u0696\u062f.meaning: adj. Long, elongated, extended, stretched out, prolonged; (Fem.) اږده uj̱ẕdaʿh. See اګد and اوږد or اوږده.
\u0627\u0696\u062f.original: اږد uj̱ẕd, adj. Long, elongated, extended, stretched out, prolonged; (Fem.) اږده uj̱ẕdaʿh. See اګد and اوږد or اوږده.

\u0622\u0696\u064a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To incite, to stimulate, to instigate, to set on, to provoke, to urge, to rouse, to pat on the back.
