Pres. آږيي āj̱ẕi-yī; past ؤ آږيه wu-āj̱ẕi-yah; fut. ؤ به آږيي wu bah āj̱ẕi-yī; imp. ؤ آږيه wu āj̱ẕi-yah; act. part. آږيونکيَ aj̱ẕi-yūnkaey, or آږيونيَ āj̱ẕi-yūnaey; past. part. آږيليَ āj̱ẕi-yalaey; verb. n. آږينه āj̱ẕi-yanaʿh. See اګئيل.
\u0622\u0696\u064a\u0644.original: آږيل āj̱ẕi-yil, verb trans. To incite, to stimulate, to instigate, to set on, to provoke, to urge, to rouse, to pat on the back. Pres. آږيي āj̱ẕi-yī; past ؤ آږيه wu-āj̱ẕi-yah; fut. ؤ به آږيي wu bah āj̱ẕi-yī; imp. ؤ آږيه wu āj̱ẕi-yah; act. part. آږيونکيَ aj̱ẕi-yūnkaey, or آږيونيَ āj̱ẕi-yūnaey; past. part. آږيليَ āj̱ẕi-yalaey; verb. n. آږينه āj̱ẕi-yanaʿh. See اګئيل.

\u0622\u0633.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A horse. Pl. آسونه ās-ūnah; (W.) s.m. (5th) Pl. آسان ās-ān; له آسَ کوزيدل lah āsa kūzedal, verb intrans. To dismount from a horse. په آس سپریدل pah ās spare- dal, verb intrans. To mount or get on horseback.
\u0622\u0633.original: آس ās, s.m. (2nd) A horse. Pl. آسونه ās-ūnah; (W.) s.m. (5th) Pl. آسان ās-ān; له آسَ کوزيدل lah āsa kūzedal, verb intrans. To dismount from a horse. په آس سپریدل pah ās spare- dal, verb intrans. To mount or get on horseback.

\u0627\u0633\u0627\u0633.meaning: s.m. (9th) Foundation, basis; a pedestal. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) Foundation, basis; a pedestal. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0633\u0627\u0646.meaning: adj. Easy, convenient, facile, commodious, not difficult; (Fem.) آسانه āsānaʿh; آسان کیدل āsān kedal, verb intrans. To become easy, facile, or convenient. آسان کول āsān kawul, verb. trans. To facilitate, to expedite, to render easy or smooth.
original: adj. Easy, convenient, facile, commodious, not difficult; (Fem.) آسانه āsānaʿh; آسان کیدل āsān kedal, verb intrans. To become easy, facile, or convenient. آسان کول āsān kawul, verb. trans. To facilitate, to expedite, to render easy or smooth.

\u0622\u0633\u0627\u06cc\u0634.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Rest, ease, repose, tranquillity, quiet. Pl. آسایشونه āsā-īs̱ẖūnah. آسایش کول āsā-īs̱ẖ kawul, verb trans. To rest, to repose.
original: s.m. (2nd) Rest, ease, repose, tranquillity, quiet. Pl. آسایشونه āsā-īs̱ẖūnah. آسایش کول āsā-īs̱ẖ kawul, verb trans. To rest, to repose.

\u0627\u0633\u0628\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (Pl. of سبب) Causes, motives, means. 2. Goods and chattels, furniture, stores, baggage. Pl. اسبابونه asbābūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (Pl. of سبب) Causes, motives, means. 2. Goods and chattels, furniture, stores, baggage. Pl. اسبابونه asbābūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u067e\u063a\u0648\u0644.meaning: s.m. (6th) The name of a plant--the flea-wort, a plant of the plantain family. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) The name of a plant--the flea-wort, a plant of the plantain family. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0633\u067e\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A mare. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0622\u0633\u067e\u0647.original: آسپه ās-paʿh, s.f. (3rd) A mare. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0633\u067e\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) The quinsy, suffocation, strangulation. 2. A kind of cutaneous disease, in which spots appear on the body, and the remedy for which is indigo. (W.) Pl. يْ ey. See خناق and هسپه.
\u0627\u0633\u067e\u0647.original: اسپه as-paʿh, s.f. (3rd) The quinsy, suffocation, strangulation. 2. A kind of cutaneous disease, in which spots appear on the body, and the remedy for which is indigo. (W.) Pl. يْ ey. See خناق and هسپه.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u062f.meaning: s.m. (5th) A teacher, preceptor, master, artist. Pl. استادان ustādān. استاده us-tādaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A preceptress, a schoolmistress. Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.m. (5th) A teacher, preceptor, master, artist. Pl. استادان ustādān. استاده us-tādaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A preceptress, a schoolmistress. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u062f\u064a.meaning: s.f. (1st) Teaching, instruction, mastership, skill, art. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: s.f. (1st) Teaching, instruction, mastership, skill, art. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0630.meaning: s.m. (5th) A teacher, a master (corrup. of P استاد). Pl. استاذان ustāẕ-ān. استاذه us-tāẕaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A mistress, a preceptress. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0630.original: استاذ us-tāẕ, s.m. (5th) A teacher, a master (corrup. of P استاد). Pl. استاذان ustāẕ-ān. استاذه us-tāẕaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A mistress, a preceptress. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0632\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A messenger, a legate, a delegate, an apostle, an umpire, a peace-maker. Pl. ي ī. See استیڅه and ګواښ.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0632\u064a.original: استازيَ as-tāzaey, s.m. (1st) A messenger, a legate, a delegate, an apostle, an umpire, a peace-maker. Pl. ي ī. See استیڅه and ګواښ.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0685\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A messenger, etc. See preceding. Pl. يِ ī. See استوڅي.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0685\u064a.original: استاڅيَ as-tāḏẕaey, s.m. (1st) A messenger, etc. See preceding. Pl. يِ ī. See استوڅي.

\u0622\u0633\u062a\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A threshold, an entrance. Pl. آستانونه āstānūnak; or آستانه āstānah, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.m. (2nd) A threshold, an entrance. Pl. آستانونه āstānūnak; or آستانه āstānah, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u062e\u0648\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A bone, a stone or kernel in fruit. Pl. استخوانونه ustuḵẖwānūnah. See هډ and هډوکي.
original: s.m. (2nd) A bone, a stone or kernel in fruit. Pl. استخوانونه ustuḵẖwānūnah. See هډ and هډوکي.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u062f\u0639\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of دعوت) Request, desire, application, invitation (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. استدعاوي is-tidœāwī.
original: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of دعوت) Request, desire, application, invitation (E.) Sing. and Pl. (W.) Pl. استدعاوي is-tidœāwī.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0639\u062f\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of عد) Readiness, proficiency, capacity, means, ability. Pl. استعدادونه is-tiœdādūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of عد) Readiness, proficiency, capacity, means, ability. Pl. استعدادونه is-tiœdādūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0639\u0641\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of عفو) Asking forgiveness, deprecating. 2. Giving in one's resignation from office or duty. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. استعفاوي is-tiœfāwī.
original: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of عفو) Asking forgiveness, deprecating. 2. Giving in one's resignation from office or duty. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. استعفاوي is-tiœfāwī.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0639\u0645\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of عمل) Custom, daily practice, exercise, use. Pl. استعمالونه is-tiœmālūnah. استعمال کول is-tiœmāl kawul, verb trans. To use, to exercise.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of عمل) Custom, daily practice, exercise, use. Pl. استعمالونه is-tiœmālūnah. استعمال کول is-tiœmāl kawul, verb trans. To use, to exercise.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u063a\u0627\u062b\u06.meaning: s.f. (3rd) (inf. X of غوث) Asking for help, demanding justice, complaining. Pl. يْ ey. استغاثه کول is-tig̠ẖās̤aʿh kawul, verb trans. To complain, to demand justice.
original: s.f. (3rd) (inf. X of غوث) Asking for help, demanding justice, complaining. Pl. يْ ey. استغاثه کول is-tig̠ẖās̤aʿh kawul, verb trans. To complain, to demand justice.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u063a\u0641\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of غفران) Begging mercy, craving grace, asking forgiveness. Pl. استغفارونه is-tig̠ẖ-fārūnah. استغفار کول is-tig̠ẖ-fār kawul, verb trans. To deprecate, to crave mercy.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of غفران) Begging mercy, craving grace, asking forgiveness. Pl. استغفارونه is-tig̠ẖ-fārūnah. استغفار کول is-tig̠ẖ-fār kawul, verb trans. To deprecate, to crave mercy.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u063a\u0641\u0631\u06.meaning: interj. I entreat forgiveness of God! God forbid!
original: interj. I entreat forgiveness of God! God forbid!

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u063a\u0646\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of غنا) Content, independence, exemption. 2. Adj. Contented, independent. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. استغناوي is-tig̠ẖnāwī.
original: s.f. (6th) (inf. X of غنا) Content, independence, exemption. 2. Adj. Contented, independent. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. استغناوي is-tig̠ẖnāwī.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0641\u0633\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of فسر) Inquiry, asking an explanation, interrogating. Pl. استفسارونه is-tifsārūnah. استفسار کول is-tifsār kawul, verb trans. To enquire, to ask, to interrogate.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of فسر) Inquiry, asking an explanation, interrogating. Pl. استفسارونه is-tifsārūnah. استفسار کول is-tifsār kawul, verb trans. To enquire, to ask, to interrogate.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0642\u0627\u0645\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قیام) Standing erect. 2. Rectitude, stability, integrity, constancy. Pl. استقامتونه is-tiḳāmatūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قیام) Standing erect. 2. Rectitude, stability, integrity, constancy. Pl. استقامتونه is-tiḳāmatūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0642\u0628\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قبل) Meeting, encountering. 2. The ceremony of meeting and receiving a visitor. 3. Futurity. Pl. استقبالونه is-tiḳbālūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قبل) Meeting, encountering. 2. The ceremony of meeting and receiving a visitor. 3. Futurity. Pl. استقبالونه is-tiḳbālūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0642\u0644\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قلت) Absolute power, authority, sovereignty, independence, absoluteness, etc. Pl. استقلالونه is-tiḳlālūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of قلت) Absolute power, authority, sovereignty, independence, absoluteness, etc. Pl. استقلالونه is-tiḳlālūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0645\u0627\u0639.meaning: s.f. (1st) (inf. VIII of سمسع) Hearing, listening, giving ear to. Pl. استماع ِ is-timāœi.
original: s.f. (1st) (inf. VIII of سمسع) Hearing, listening, giving ear to. Pl. استماع ِ is-timāœi.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0645\u0631\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of مرور) Continuation, perseverance, perpetuity. 2. The name of the continuative tense in grammar. Pl. استمرارونه is-timrārūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. X of مرور) Continuation, perseverance, perpetuity. 2. The name of the continuative tense in grammar. Pl. استمرارونه is-timrārūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0627\u0631.meaning: adj. Strong, firm, stable, powerful, brave, resolute; (Fem.) استواره us-tuwāraʿh.
original: adj. Strong, firm, stable, powerful, brave, resolute; (Fem.) استواره us-tuwāraʿh.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0632\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Residence, dwelling, habitation. Pl. يْ ey. استوزه کول as-tozaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0632\u0647.original: استوزه as-tozaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Residence, dwelling, habitation. Pl. يْ ey. استوزه کول as-tozaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0685\u064a.meaning: adj. (past part. from استول) Sent, dispatched. 2. A messenger, a legate, a party sent in place of another, a courier; (Fem.) استوڅ َ as-toḏẕi. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī. See استاڅي.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0685\u064a.original: استوڅيَ as-toḏẕaey, adj. (past part. from استول) Sent, dispatched. 2. A messenger, a legate, a party sent in place of another, a courier; (Fem.) استوڅ َ as-toḏẕi. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī. See استاڅي.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0698\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Residence, etc. Pl. يْ ey. See استوزه and استوګه.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0698\u0647.original: استوژه as-toj̱ẕaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Residence, etc. Pl. يْ ey. See استوزه and استوګه.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06a9\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Pl. يْ ey. See following.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06a9\u0647.original: استوکه as-tokaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Pl. يْ ey. See following.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06ab\u0646\u06.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Residence, dwelling, abode. 2. Tranquillity. Pl. يْ ey. استوګنه کول as-tognaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside, to take up residence.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06ab\u0646\u06.original: استوګنه as-tognah, s.f. (3rd) Residence, dwelling, abode. 2. Tranquillity. Pl. يْ ey. استوګنه کول as-tognaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside, to take up residence.

\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06ab\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Residence, etc. Pl. ْي ey. استوګه کول as-togaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside. See preceding words.
\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0648\u06ab\u0647.original: استوګه as-togaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Residence, etc. Pl. ْي ey. استوګه کول as-togaʿh kawul, verb trans. To dwell, to reside. See preceding words.

\u0622\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To send, to depute, to dispatch, to forward, to transmit. Pres. آستوي āstawī; past واستاوه wās-tāwuh, or واستاوو wās-tāwo; fut. وابه ستوي wā bah stawī; imp. واستوه wās-tawah; act. part. آستوونکيَ ās-tawūnkaey, or آستوونيَ as-tawūnaey; past part. آستوليَ ās-tawulaey, and آستوڅيَ ās-toḏẕaey; verb n. آستونه ās-tawunaʿh.
\u0622\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0644.original: آستول āstawul, verb trans. To send, to depute, to dispatch, to forward, to transmit. Pres. آستوي āstawī; past واستاوه wās-tāwuh, or واستاوو wās-tāwo; fut. وابه ستوي wā bah stawī; imp. واستوه wās-tawah; act. part. آستوونکيَ ās-tawūnkaey, or آستوونيَ as-tawūnaey; past part. آستوليَ ās-tawulaey, and آستوڅيَ ās-toḏẕaey; verb n. آستونه ās-tawunaʿh.

\u0622\u0633\u062a\u064a\u062f\u0644.meaning: verb intrans. To dwell, to inhabit, to reside, to abide, to stay, to sojourn, to halt, etc. Pres. آستیږي ās-tej̱ẕī (W.) or آستیګي ās-tegī (E.); past ؤ آستيده wu-āstedah, or ؤ آستيدَ wu-āsteda; fut. ؤ به آستیږي wu bah astej̱ẕī, or آستيګي āstegī; imp. ؤ آستیړه wu-āstej̱ẕah, or ؤ آستيګه wu-astegah; act. part. آستيدونکيَ āstedūnkaey, or آستيدنَيَ āstedūnaey; past part. آستيدليَ āstedalaey; verb. n. آستيدنه āstedanaʿh, or آستيده āstedah. آستول ās-tawul, verb trans. (caus.), To make or cause to dwell or reside, to station, to locate, to halt, to cause or make to sojourn or stay. Pres. آستوي āstawī; past ؤ آستاوه wu-āstāwuh, or ؤ آستاوو wu-āstāwo; fut. ؤ به آستوي wu bah āstawī; imp. ؤ آستوه wu-āstawah; act. part. آستوونکيَ āstawūnkaey, or آستوونيَ āstawūnaey; past part. آستوليَ āstawulaey; verb. n. آستونه āstawunaʿh. See استيدل.
\u0622\u0633\u062a\u064a\u062f\u0644.original: آستيدل ās-tedal, verb intrans. To dwell, to inhabit, to reside, to abide, to stay, to sojourn, to halt, etc. Pres. آستیږي ās-tej̱ẕī (W.) or آستیګي ās-tegī (E.); past ؤ آستيده wu-āstedah, or ؤ آستيدَ wu-āsteda; fut. ؤ به آستیږي wu bah astej̱ẕī, or آستيګي āstegī; imp. ؤ آستیړه wu-āstej̱ẕah, or ؤ آستيګه wu-astegah; act. part. آستيدونکيَ āstedūnkaey, or آستيدنَيَ āstedūnaey; past part. آستيدليَ āstedalaey; verb. n. آستيدنه āstedanaʿh, or آستيده āstedah. آستول ās-tawul, verb trans. (caus.), To make or cause to dwell or reside, to station, to locate, to halt, to cause or make to sojourn or stay. Pres. آستوي āstawī; past ؤ آستاوه wu-āstāwuh, or ؤ آستاوو wu-āstāwo; fut. ؤ به آستوي wu bah āstawī; imp. ؤ آستوه wu-āstawah; act. part. آستوونکيَ āstawūnkaey, or آستوونيَ āstawūnaey; past part. آستوليَ āstawulaey; verb. n. آستونه āstawunaʿh. See استيدل.

\u0627\u0633\u062d\u0627\u0642\u0632\u06.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe; اسحاقزيَ is-ḥāḳzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe; اسحاقزئِي is-ḥāḳzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the tribe. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0633\u062d\u0627\u0642\u0632\u06.original: اسحاقزِي is-ḥāḳzī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe; اسحاقزيَ is-ḥāḳzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe; اسحاقزئِي is-ḥāḳzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the tribe. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0633\u0631\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سر) Concealment, keeping secret. 2. Disclosure, revealing of a secret. Pl. اسرارونه is-rārūnah. اسرار ساتل is-rār sātal, verb trans. To keep a secret. اسرارويل is-rār wa-yal, verb trans. To reveal a secret.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سر) Concealment, keeping secret. 2. Disclosure, revealing of a secret. Pl. اسرارونه is-rārūnah. اسرار ساتل is-rār sātal, verb trans. To keep a secret. اسرارويل is-rār wa-yal, verb trans. To reveal a secret.

\u0627\u0633\u0631\u0627\u0641.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سرف), Prodigality, abuse of wealth, dissipation, extravagance. Pl اسرافونه is-rāfūnah. اسراف کول is-rāf kawul, verb trans. To dissipate, to act extravagantly, to abuse wealth.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سرف), Prodigality, abuse of wealth, dissipation, extravagance. Pl اسرافونه is-rāfūnah. اسراف کول is-rāf kawul, verb trans. To dissipate, to act extravagantly, to abuse wealth.

\u0627\u0633\u0631\u0627\u0641\u064a\u06.meaning: s. prop. The name of the angel who, it is said, will sound the last trump at the resurrection. 2. A seraph.
original: s. prop. The name of the angel who, it is said, will sound the last trump at the resurrection. 2. A seraph.

\u0627\u0633\u0637\u0631\u0644\u0627\u06.meaning: s.m. (2nd) An astrolabe. Pl. اسطرلابونه us-t̤urlābūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) An astrolabe. Pl. اسطرلابونه us-t̤urlābūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u0642\u0627\u0637.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سقط), Causing to fall, procuring abortion, miscarriage. Pl. اسقاطونه is-ḳāt̤ūnah. اسقاط کول is-ḳāt̤ kawul, verb trans. To produce miscarriage, to cause abortion. See امغلن آچول.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of سقط), Causing to fall, procuring abortion, miscarriage. Pl. اسقاطونه is-ḳāt̤ūnah. اسقاط کول is-ḳāt̤ kawul, verb trans. To produce miscarriage, to cause abortion. See امغلن آچول.

\u0627\u0633\u0644\u0627\u0645.meaning: s.m. (9th) (inf. IV. of سلم), The Muḥammadan religion, orthodoxy. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) (inf. IV. of سلم), The Muḥammadan religion, orthodoxy. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0633\u0645.meaning: a noun. Pl. اسماء as- māʿa. اسم جامد ism-i-jāmid, A primitive noun. اسم جنس ism-i-jins, A generic noun. اسم حاليه ism-i-ḥāliyaʿh, The present participle. اسم صفت ism-i-ṣifat, A concrete noun, an adjective. اسم عدد ism-i-œadad, A cardinal number. اسم مشتق ism-i-mus̱ẖtaḳ, An ordinal number. اسم فاعل ism-i-fāʿœil, The agent, actor, or active participle. اسم مفعول ism-i-mafœūl, The past participle. اسم مصدر ism-i-maṣdar, A verbal noun, etc.
original: a noun. Pl. اسماء as- māʿa. اسم جامد ism-i-jāmid, A primitive noun. اسم جنس ism-i-jins, A generic noun. اسم حاليه ism-i-ḥāliyaʿh, The present participle. اسم صفت ism-i-ṣifat, A concrete noun, an adjective. اسم عدد ism-i-œadad, A cardinal number. اسم مشتق ism-i-mus̱ẖtaḳ, An ordinal number. اسم فاعل ism-i-fāʿœil, The agent, actor, or active participle. اسم مفعول ism-i-mafœūl, The past participle. اسم مصدر ism-i-maṣdar, A verbal noun, etc.

\u0627\u0633\u0645\u0627.meaning: is-mā-œīlzī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe; اسماعيلزيَ is-mā-œīlzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe; اسما عيلزئِي is-mā-œīlzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl. (A اسماعيل is-mā-œīl, Ishmael the son of Abraham).
\u0627\u0633\u0645\u0627.original: اسما عیلزي is-mā-œīlzī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of an Afg̠ẖān tribe; اسماعيلزيَ is-mā-œīlzaey, Sing. A male of the above tribe; اسما عيلزئِي is-mā-œīlzaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl. (A اسماعيل is-mā-œīl, Ishmael the son of Abraham).

\u0622\u0633\u0645\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The sky, the heavens, the firmament. Pl. آسمانونه ās-mān-ūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) The sky, the heavens, the firmament. Pl. آسمانونه ās-mān-ūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u0648.meaning: s.m. (9th) The sixth month of the Hindū year. The last month of the rainy season. (S آسن). The Afg̠ẖāns in the vicinity of Peś̱ẖāwer use the names of the Hindū months when speaking of, or referring to, agriculture. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0633\u0648.original: اسو asū, s.m. (9th) The sixth month of the Hindū year. The last month of the rainy season. (S آسن). The Afg̠ẖāns in the vicinity of Peś̱ẖāwer use the names of the Hindū months when speaking of, or referring to, agriculture. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0633\u0648\u062f\u06ab\u06cc.meaning: or آسوده ګي āsūdah-gī, s.f. (3rd) Quiet, rest, content, tranquility. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: or آسوده ګي āsūdah-gī, s.f. (3rd) Quiet, rest, content, tranquility. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0622\u0633\u0648\u062f\u0647.meaning: adj. At rest, quiet, tranquil, satisfied, contented. آسوده حال āsūdah ḥāl, adj. Affluent, in easy circumstances.
original: adj. At rest, quiet, tranquil, satisfied, contented. آسوده حال āsūdah ḥāl, adj. Affluent, in easy circumstances.

\u0627\u0633\u0648\u064a\u0644\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A deep-drawn sigh, a cold sigh, a sob. 2. The sound uttered by a person when shivering from cold. Pl. يِ ī. اسويلېَ کول as-welaey kawul, verb trans. To sigh, to sob; to tremble through cold, to utter a shivering sound when cold. Also اسويلکيَ as-welkaey, s.m. (1st). Pl. يِ ī.
\u0627\u0633\u0648\u064a\u0644\u064a.original: اسويليَ as-welaey, s.m. (1st) A deep-drawn sigh, a cold sigh, a sob. 2. The sound uttered by a person when shivering from cold. Pl. يِ ī. اسويلېَ کول as-welaey kawul, verb trans. To sigh, to sob; to tremble through cold, to utter a shivering sound when cold. Also اسويلکيَ as-welkaey, s.m. (1st). Pl. يِ ī.

\u0627\u0633\u064a.meaning: adj. Unlucky, bad, inauspicious. 2. An unfortunate person. Pl. اسِيان asī-ān. (Fem.) اسئِي asaʿī, Sing. and Pl. (6th).
\u0627\u0633\u064a.original: اسي asī, adj. Unlucky, bad, inauspicious. 2. An unfortunate person. Pl. اسِيان asī-ān. (Fem.) اسئِي asaʿī, Sing. and Pl. (6th).

\u0627\u0633\u0626\u064a.original: اسئِي asaʿī, s.f. (6th) Hoar-frost. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0633\u064a\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) A-water-mill. Pl. (W.) آسياوي ā-siyāwī; (E.) Sing. and Pl. See ژرنده.
original: s.f. (6th) A-water-mill. Pl. (W.) آسياوي ā-siyāwī; (E.) Sing. and Pl. See ژرنده.

\u0622\u0633\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A whetstone. Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.f. (3rd) A whetstone. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0622\u0633\u064a\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Misfortune (the consequence of a demon's shadow having fallen on one), trouble, calamity, damage. Pl. آسيبونه ā-sebūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) Misfortune (the consequence of a demon's shadow having fallen on one), trouble, calamity, damage. Pl. آسيبونه ā-sebūnah.

\u0627\u0633\u064a\u0631.meaning: s.m. (5th) A prisoner, a captive. Pl. اسیران a-sīrān. اسيره a-sīraʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female captive or prisoner. Pl. يْ ey. اسير کيدل a-sīr kedal, verb intrans. To become captive. اسير کول a-sīr kawul, verb trans. To take captive.
original: s.m. (5th) A prisoner, a captive. Pl. اسیران a-sīrān. اسيره a-sīraʿh, s.f. (3rd) A female captive or prisoner. Pl. يْ ey. اسير کيدل a-sīr kedal, verb intrans. To become captive. اسير کول a-sīr kawul, verb trans. To take captive.

\u0622\u0633\u064a\u0627\u0648\u0627\u06.meaning: or آسيوان ā-sewān, s.m. (5th) A miller. Pl. آسياوانان ā-siyā-wānān, or آسيوانان ā-sewānān.
original: or آسيوان ā-sewān, s.m. (5th) A miller. Pl. آسياوانان ā-siyā-wānān, or آسيوانان ā-sewānān.

\u0622\u0634.meaning: s.m. (6th) Meat, victuals, viands, soup, broth, gruel, pottage, a kind of dish made from barley. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) Meat, victuals, viands, soup, broth, gruel, pottage, a kind of dish made from barley. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0634\u0627\u0631\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Sign, wink, hint, signal, allusion. Pl. اشارتونه is̱ẖā-ratūnah or اشاره is̱ẖā-raʿh, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey. اشاره کول is̱ẖā-raʿh kawul, verb trans. To give a hint, to make a sign, signal, or allusion.
original: s.m. (2nd) Sign, wink, hint, signal, allusion. Pl. اشارتونه is̱ẖā-ratūnah or اشاره is̱ẖā-raʿh, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey. اشاره کول is̱ẖā-raʿh kawul, verb trans. To give a hint, to make a sign, signal, or allusion.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0628\u0627\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Doubt, scruple, ambiguity. Pl. يْ ey. اشتباهي is̱ẖ-tibāhī, adj. Suspicious, doubtful.
original: s.f. (3rd) Doubt, scruple, ambiguity. Pl. يْ ey. اشتباهي is̱ẖ-tibāhī, adj. Suspicious, doubtful.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0631\u0627\u0646\u06.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns; اشترانيَ as̱ẖ-tarānaey, Sing. A man or male of the tribe; اشترانئِي as̱ẖ-tarānaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0631\u0627\u0646\u06.original: اشتراني as̱ẖ-tarānī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns; اشترانيَ as̱ẖ-tarānaey, Sing. A man or male of the tribe; اشترانئِي as̱ẖ-tarānaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u063a\u0627\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of شغل), Occupation, employment, study, business. Pl. اشتغالونه is̱ẖ-tig̠ẖālūnah.
\u0627\u0634\u062a\u063a\u0627\u0644.original: اشتغال is̱ẖ-tig̠ẖāl, s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of شغل), Occupation, employment, study, business. Pl. اشتغالونه is̱ẖ-tig̠ẖālūnah.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0648\u06a9\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Peace, concord, reconciliation. Pl. يْ ey. See آشتي.
\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0648\u06a9\u0647.original: اشتوکه as̱ẖ-tokaʿh, s.f. (3rd) Peace, concord, reconciliation. Pl. يْ ey. See آشتي.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0647\u0627.meaning: s.f. (6th) Appetite, desire. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. اشتهاوي is̱ẖ-tihāwī. See also لیوال.
original: s.f. (6th) Appetite, desire. (E.) Sing. and Pl.; (W.) Pl. اشتهاوي is̱ẖ-tihāwī. See also لیوال.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u0647\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Publication, report, fame, divulging. Pl. اشتهارونه is̱ẖ-tihārūnah. اشتهارکول is̱ẖ-tihār kawul, verb trans. To publish, to divulge, to report, to spread abroad.
original: s.m. (2nd) Publication, report, fame, divulging. Pl. اشتهارونه is̱ẖ-tihārūnah. اشتهارکول is̱ẖ-tihār kawul, verb trans. To publish, to divulge, to report, to spread abroad.

\u0622\u0634\u062a\u064a.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Peace, concord. 2. Amour, intrigue. Pl. ئِي aʿī. آشتي کول ās̱ẖtī kawul, verb trans. To make peace, to live in concord with.
original: s.f. (3rd) Peace, concord. 2. Amour, intrigue. Pl. ئِي aʿī. آشتي کول ās̱ẖtī kawul, verb trans. To make peace, to live in concord with.

\u0627\u0634\u062a\u06cc\u0627\u0642.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of شوق), Wish, desire, strong inclination. Pl. اشتیاقونه is̱ẖ-tiyāḳūnah. اشتیاق لرل is̱ẖ-tiyāḳ laral, verb trans. To have a strong inclination, to desire, to wish.
\u0627\u0634\u062a\u06cc\u0627\u0642.original: اشتیاق is̱ẖ-tiyāḳ, s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of شوق), Wish, desire, strong inclination. Pl. اشتیاقونه is̱ẖ-tiyāḳūnah. اشتیاق لرل is̱ẖ-tiyāḳ laral, verb trans. To have a strong inclination, to desire, to wish.

\u0627\u0634\u0631\u067e\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (6th) (E.) The name of a gold coin in value from 17 to 20 rupees. Sing. and Pl.; (W.) اشرپي as̱ẖ-rapī, s.f. (3rd). Pl. ئِي aʿī (P اشرفي).
\u0627\u0634\u0631\u067e\u0626\u064a.original: اشرپئِي] as̱ẖ-rapaʿī, s.f. (6th) (E.) The name of a gold coin in value from 17 to 20 rupees. Sing. and Pl.; (W.) اشرپي as̱ẖ-rapī, s.f. (3rd). Pl. ئِي aʿī (P اشرفي).

\u0622\u0634\u0641\u062a\u06ab\u200d.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Distraction, uneasiness, perturbation, misery. Pl. ئِي aʿī.
original: s.f. (3rd) Distraction, uneasiness, perturbation, misery. Pl. ئِي aʿī.

\u0622\u0634\u0641\u062a\u0647.meaning: adj. Distracted, distressed, miserable, uneasy, disturbed. آشفته حال ās̱ẖuftah-ḥāl, Distressed in circumstances, in adversity.
original: adj. Distracted, distressed, miserable, uneasy, disturbed. آشفته حال ās̱ẖuftah-ḥāl, Distressed in circumstances, in adversity.

\u0627\u0634\u06a9.meaning: s.m. (2nd) A tear. Pl. اشکونه as̱ẖkūnah. See اوښي.
original: s.m. (2nd) A tear. Pl. اشکونه as̱ẖkūnah. See اوښي.

\u0622\u0634\u0646\u0627\u064a.meaning: s.m. (5th) Anacquaintance, a lover, a friend. Pl. آشنایان ās̱ẖ-nāʿe-ān; آشنایه ās̱ẖ-nāyaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A mistress, a sweetheart, a female friend. Pl. يْ ey. Also (P) آشنا ās̱ẖ-nā, s.m. (5th) Pl. آشنایان ās̱ẖ-nāyān.
\u0622\u0634\u0646\u0627\u064a.original: آشنايِ ās̱ẖ-nāʿe, s.m. (5th) Anacquaintance, a lover, a friend. Pl. آشنایان ās̱ẖ-nāʿe-ān; آشنایه ās̱ẖ-nāyaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A mistress, a sweetheart, a female friend. Pl. يْ ey. Also (P) آشنا ās̱ẖ-nā, s.m. (5th) Pl. آشنایان ās̱ẖ-nāyān.

\u0622\u0634\u0646\u0627\u0626\u064a.meaning: s.f. (3rd) Acquaintanceship, intimacy, friendship. Pl. ئِي aʿī. آشنائي لرل ās̱ẖ-nāʿī laral, verb trans. To have or hold acquaintanceship; (Eng. verb intrans.) To be intimate, or on terms of intimacy. آشنائي کول ās̱ẖ-nāʿī kawul, verb trans. To make acquaintance, to form intimacy.
original: s.f. (3rd) Acquaintanceship, intimacy, friendship. Pl. ئِي aʿī. آشنائي لرل ās̱ẖ-nāʿī laral, verb trans. To have or hold acquaintanceship; (Eng. verb intrans.) To be intimate, or on terms of intimacy. آشنائي کول ās̱ẖ-nāʿī kawul, verb trans. To make acquaintance, to form intimacy.

\u0627\u0634\u0646\u063a\u0631.meaning: s. prop, The name of a town, consisting of three separate villages, in the Do-ābah of Peś̱ẖāwer, properly هشت نګر has̱ẖt-nagar, Or the eight towns.
\u0627\u0634\u0646\u063a\u0631.original: اشنغر as̱ẖ-nag̠ẖar, s. prop, The name of a town, consisting of three separate villages, in the Do-ābah of Peś̱ẖāwer, properly هشت نګر has̱ẖt-nagar, Or the eight towns.

\u0622\u0634\u0648\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Clamour, tumult. 2. Storm, tempest. 3. Terror. 4. Misfortune. Pl. آشوبونه ās̱ẖūbūnah. Also written ās̱ẖob.
original: s.m. (2nd) Clamour, tumult. 2. Storm, tempest. 3. Terror. 4. Misfortune. Pl. آشوبونه ās̱ẖūbūnah. Also written ās̱ẖob.

\u0627\u0634\u0648\u0631\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of A عاشوره), The first ten days of the month Muḥarram. Pl. يْ ey.
\u0627\u0634\u0648\u0631\u0647.original: اشوره as̱ẖ-ūraʿh, s.f. (3rd) (corrup. of A عاشوره), The first ten days of the month Muḥarram. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0622\u0634\u0648\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Noise, tumult, disturbance, outcry, clamour, bustle. Pl. آشولونه ā-s̱ẖolūnah. آشول کول ā-s̱ẖol kawul, verb trans. To raise or create a tumult, disturbance, outcry, etc.
\u0622\u0634\u0648\u0644.original: آشول ā-s̱ẖol, s.m. (2nd) Noise, tumult, disturbance, outcry, clamour, bustle. Pl. آشولونه ā-s̱ẖolūnah. آشول کول ā-s̱ẖol kawul, verb trans. To raise or create a tumult, disturbance, outcry, etc.

\u0627\u0634\u06cc\u0627.meaning: s.m. (A Pl. of شي) Things, effects.
original: s.m. (A Pl. of شي) Things, effects.

\u0627\u0634\u06cc\u0627\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A bird's nest. Pl. يْ ey. See جآله.
original: s.f. (3rd) A bird's nest. Pl. يْ ey. See جآله.

\u0622\u069a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. (E.) To mix, to mingle (as flour and water for bread), to knead, to leaven, to excite fermentation. Pres. آغګي āg̠ẖ-gī; past واښل wā-ḵ́ẖal; fut. وا به غګي wā bah g̠ẖʿgī; imp. واغګه wā-g̠ẖʿgah; act. part. آښونکيَ āḵ́ẖūnkaey, or آښونيَ āḵ́ẖūnaey; past part. آښليَ āḵ́ẖalaey; verb. n. آښنه āḵ́ẖanaʿh. See آغږل.
\u0622\u069a\u0644.original: آښل āḵ́ẖal, verb trans. (E.) To mix, to mingle (as flour and water for bread), to knead, to leaven, to excite fermentation. Pres. آغګي āg̠ẖ-gī; past واښل wā-ḵ́ẖal; fut. وا به غګي wā bah g̠ẖʿgī; imp. واغګه wā-g̠ẖʿgah; act. part. آښونکيَ āḵ́ẖūnkaey, or آښونيَ āḵ́ẖūnaey; past part. آښليَ āḵ́ẖalaey; verb. n. آښنه āḵ́ẖanaʿh. See آغږل.

\u0622\u069a\u0644\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. (past part. of آښل) Dough.
\u0622\u069a\u0644\u064a.original: آښلي āḵ́ẖalī, s.m. (1st) Pl. (past part. of آښل) Dough.

\u0627\u0635\u062d\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.pl. (of صاحب) Lords, masters, companions, friends, apostles.
original: s.pl. (of صاحب) Lords, masters, companions, friends, apostles.

\u0627\u0635\u0631\u0627\u0641.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of صرف) Expenditure, waste, prodigality. Pl. اصرافونه iṣ-rāfūnah. اصراف کول iṣ-rāf kawul, verb trans. To expend, to waste.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of صرف) Expenditure, waste, prodigality. Pl. اصرافونه iṣ-rāfūnah. اصراف کول iṣ-rāf kawul, verb trans. To expend, to waste.

\u0627\u0635\u0644.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Root, origin, original, foundation, lineage. 2. Capital. Pl. اصلونه aṣl-ūnah. بد اصل bad aṣl, Of mean or bad lineage; نیک اصل nek aṣl, Of good family or lineage.
original: s.m. (2nd) Root, origin, original, foundation, lineage. 2. Capital. Pl. اصلونه aṣl-ūnah. بد اصل bad aṣl, Of mean or bad lineage; نیک اصل nek aṣl, Of good family or lineage.

\u0627\u0635\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. Original, radical, essential, genuine, noble.
original: adj. Original, radical, essential, genuine, noble.

\u0627\u0635\u06cc\u0644.meaning: adj. Well-born, noble, genuine; (Fem.) اصیله aṣīlaʿh.
original: adj. Well-born, noble, genuine; (Fem.) اصیله aṣīlaʿh.

\u0627\u0636\u0637\u0631\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of ضرب) Agitation, perturbation, restlessness, distraction, anguish, trouble, chagrin. Pl. اضطرابونه iẓ-t̤irābūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of ضرب) Agitation, perturbation, restlessness, distraction, anguish, trouble, chagrin. Pl. اضطرابونه iẓ-t̤irābūnah.

\u0627\u0637\u0627\u0639\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of طوع), Obeying, submission, reverence, observance. اطاعت کول it̤ā-œat kawul, verb trans. To obey, to reverence.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of طوع), Obeying, submission, reverence, observance. اطاعت کول it̤ā-œat kawul, verb trans. To obey, to reverence.

\u0627\u0637\u0631\u0627\u0641.meaning: s.m. (Pl. of طرف) Sides, skirts, districts, environs, confines.
original: s.m. (Pl. of طرف) Sides, skirts, districts, environs, confines.

\u0627\u0637\u0641\u0627\u0644.meaning: s. pl. (of طفل) Children. عیال و اطفال œiyāl-o-at̤-fāl, Wife and children, family.
original: s. pl. (of طفل) Children. عیال و اطفال œiyāl-o-at̤-fāl, Wife and children, family.

\u0627\u0637\u0644\u0627\u0639.meaning: s.f. (1st) (inf. VIII of طلوع) Notice, manifesting, declaring, information, knowledge. اطلاع کول it̤t̤ilāœ kawul, verb trans. To acquaint, to inform, to apprize.
original: s.f. (1st) (inf. VIII of طلوع) Notice, manifesting, declaring, information, knowledge. اطلاع کول it̤t̤ilāœ kawul, verb trans. To acquaint, to inform, to apprize.

\u0627\u0637\u0648\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (Pl. of طور) Manners, behaviours, ways, habits.
original: s.m. (Pl. of طور) Manners, behaviours, ways, habits.

\u0627\u0638\u0647\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of ظهور) Manifestation, revelation, disclosure, publication, display, declaration. Pl. اظهارونه iz̤-hārūnah. اظهار کول iz̤-hār kawul, verb trans. To disclose, to reveal, to notify, to declare.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of ظهور) Manifestation, revelation, disclosure, publication, display, declaration. Pl. اظهارونه iz̤-hārūnah. اظهار کول iz̤-hār kawul, verb trans. To disclose, to reveal, to notify, to declare.

\u0627\u0639\u062a\u0628\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of عبر) Confidence, trust, faith, belief, credit, reliance. 2. Taking as an example, reasoning by comparison. Pl اعتبارونه iœ-tibārūnah. اعتبار کول iœ-tibār kawul, yerb trans. To give credit to, to believe, to trust.
\u0627\u0639\u062a\u0628\u0627\u0631.original: اعتبار iœ-tibār, s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of عبر) Confidence, trust, faith, belief, credit, reliance. 2. Taking as an example, reasoning by comparison. Pl اعتبارونه iœ-tibārūnah. اعتبار کول iœ-tibār kawul, yerb trans. To give credit to, to believe, to trust.

\u0627\u0639\u062a\u0642\u0627\u062f.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of عقد) Confidence, faith, trust. Pl. اعتقادونه iœ-tiḳādūnah. بي اعتقادَ be iœ-tiḳāda, Faithless.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. VIII of عقد) Confidence, faith, trust. Pl. اعتقادونه iœ-tiḳādūnah. بي اعتقادَ be iœ-tiḳāda, Faithless.

\u0627\u0639\u062c\u0628.meaning: adj. More, or most wonderful. 2. Wondering, being astonished, causing surprise or admiration; (Fem.) اعجبه aœ-jabaʿh.
original: adj. More, or most wonderful. 2. Wondering, being astonished, causing surprise or admiration; (Fem.) اعجبه aœ-jabaʿh.

\u0627\u0639\u062c\u0648\u0628\u0647.meaning: s.m. (6th) Wonder, astonishment, miracle, prodigy. Sing. and Pl. See اجوبه.
original: s.m. (6th) Wonder, astonishment, miracle, prodigy. Sing. and Pl. See اجوبه.

\u0627\u0639\u0631\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (6th) Wild wandering Arabs; the Arabians who live in cities being called عرب. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (6th) Wild wandering Arabs; the Arabians who live in cities being called عرب. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0639\u0631\u0627\u0628\u064a.meaning: s.m. (5th) A wanderer, a vagabond. Pl. اعرابیان aœ-rābīān; (Fem.) (6th) ئِي aʿī. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (5th) A wanderer, a vagabond. Pl. اعرابیان aœ-rābīān; (Fem.) (6th) ئِي aʿī. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0639\u0631\u0627\u0636.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of عرض) Aversion, avoiding, dislike, averseness. Pl. اعراضونه iœ-rāẓūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of عرض) Aversion, avoiding, dislike, averseness. Pl. اعراضونه iœ-rāẓūnah.

\u0627\u0639\u0631\u0627\u0641.meaning: s.m. (9th) Purgatory, a wall intervening between heaven and hell. Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) Purgatory, a wall intervening between heaven and hell. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0639\u0632\u0627\u0632.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of عزت) Honouring, magnifying; respect, honour, attention, esteem. Pl. اعزازونه iœ-zāzūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of عزت) Honouring, magnifying; respect, honour, attention, esteem. Pl. اعزازونه iœ-zāzūnah.

\u0627\u0639\u0638\u0645.meaning: adj. (compar. of عظیم) Greater, greatest; (Fem.) اعظمه aœ-z̤amaʿh.
original: adj. (compar. of عظیم) Greater, greatest; (Fem.) اعظمه aœ-z̤amaʿh.

\u0627\u0639\u0644\u0627.meaning: or اعليٰ, adj. Most high, supreme, high, sublime.
original: or اعليٰ, adj. Most high, supreme, high, sublime.

\u0622\u063a\u0627\u0632.meaning: s.m. (9th) Beginning, commencement. Sing. and Pl. آغاز کول ā-g̠ẖāz kawul, verb trans. To begin, to commence.
original: s.m. (9th) Beginning, commencement. Sing. and Pl. آغاز کول ā-g̠ẖāz kawul, verb trans. To begin, to commence.

\u0627\u063a.meaning: ag̠ẖ-dug̠ẖ, s.m. (6th) Deception, deceit, craft, duplicity, cheat, trick, double dealing, cunning. Sing. and Pl. Also written اغ دوغ ag̠ẖ-dūg̠ẖ.
\u0627\u063a.original: اغ دغ ag̠ẖ-dug̠ẖ, s.m. (6th) Deception, deceit, craft, duplicity, cheat, trick, double dealing, cunning. Sing. and Pl. Also written اغ دوغ ag̠ẖ-dūg̠ẖ.

\u0627\u063a\u0631.meaning: s.m. (9th) Fitting an arrow to the bow-string ready to shoot. Sing. and Pl. اغر کول a-g̠ẖar kawul, verb trans. To fit or place an arrow to the bow preparatory to shooting.
\u0627\u063a\u0631.original: اغر ag̠ẖar, s.m. (9th) Fitting an arrow to the bow-string ready to shoot. Sing. and Pl. اغر کول a-g̠ẖar kawul, verb trans. To fit or place an arrow to the bow preparatory to shooting.

\u0627\u063a\u0632\u06a9\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A species of thorny plant. Pl. يِ ī.
\u0627\u063a\u0632\u06a9\u064a.original: اغزکيَ āg̠ẖ-zakaey, s.m. (1st) A species of thorny plant. Pl. يِ ī.

\u0622\u063a\u0632\u0646.meaning: adj. Thorny, prickly (as a thorn-tree, etc.); (Fem.) آغزنه āg̠ẖ-zanaʿh. آغزنه ونه āg̠ẖ-zanaʿh wanaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A thorn-tree. Pl. يْ ey. See آزغن.
\u0622\u063a\u0632\u0646.original: آغزن āg̠ẖ-zan, adj. Thorny, prickly (as a thorn-tree, etc.); (Fem.) آغزنه āg̠ẖ-zanaʿh. آغزنه ونه āg̠ẖ-zanaʿh wanaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A thorn-tree. Pl. يْ ey. See آزغن.

\u0622\u063a\u0632\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) A thorn, a prickle. Pl. يِ ī. See آزغي.
\u0622\u063a\u0632\u064a.original: آغزي āg̠ẖ-zaey, s.m. (1st) A thorn, a prickle. Pl. يِ ī. See آزغي.

\u0627\u063a\u0696\u0644.meaning: verb trans. (W.) To mix, to mingle (as flour and water in making bread), to knead, to leaven, to excite fermentation. Pres. اغږي ag̠ẖa-j̱ẕī; past واغږل wā-g̠ẖaj̱ẕal; fut. وا به غږي wā bah g̠ẖaj̱ẕī; imp. واغږه wā-g̠ẖaj̱ẕah; act. part. اغږونکيَ ag̠ẖaj̱ẕūnkaey, or اغږونيَ ag̠ẖaj̱ẕūnaey; past part. اغږلِي ag̠ẖaj̱ẕalī (Pl.); verb. n. اغږنه ag̠ẖaj̱ẕanaʿh. See آښل.
\u0627\u063a\u0696\u0644.original: اغږل ag̠ẖa-j̱ẕal, verb trans. (W.) To mix, to mingle (as flour and water in making bread), to knead, to leaven, to excite fermentation. Pres. اغږي ag̠ẖa-j̱ẕī; past واغږل wā-g̠ẖaj̱ẕal; fut. وا به غږي wā bah g̠ẖaj̱ẕī; imp. واغږه wā-g̠ẖaj̱ẕah; act. part. اغږونکيَ ag̠ẖaj̱ẕūnkaey, or اغږونيَ ag̠ẖaj̱ẕūnaey; past part. اغږلِي ag̠ẖaj̱ẕalī (Pl.); verb. n. اغږنه ag̠ẖaj̱ẕanaʿh. See آښل.

\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To dress, to clothe, to array, to attire, to apparel, to accoutre, to wrap up, to envelope. Pres. آغندي āg̠ẖundī; past واغست wā-g̠ẖust; fut. وا به غندي wā bah g̠ẖundī; imp. واغنده wā-g̠ẖundah; act. part. آغستونکيَ āg̠ẖustūnkaey, or آغستونيَ āg̠ẖustūnaey; past part. آغستليَ āg̠ẖustalaey; verb. n. آغستنه āg̠ẖustanaʿh, or آغستن āg̠ẖustan.
\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0644.original: آغستل āg̠ẖustal, verb trans. To dress, to clothe, to array, to attire, to apparel, to accoutre, to wrap up, to envelope. Pres. آغندي āg̠ẖundī; past واغست wā-g̠ẖust; fut. وا به غندي wā bah g̠ẖundī; imp. واغنده wā-g̠ẖundah; act. part. آغستونکيَ āg̠ẖustūnkaey, or آغستونيَ āg̠ẖustūnaey; past part. آغستليَ āg̠ẖustalaey; verb. n. آغستنه āg̠ẖustanaʿh, or آغستن āg̠ẖustan.

\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. (past part.) Dressed, attired, clothed, arrayed, accoutred, enveloped; (Fem.) آغستل ِ āg̠ẖustali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.
\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0644\u064a.original: آغستليَ āg̠ẖustalaey, adj. (past part.) Dressed, attired, clothed, arrayed, accoutred, enveloped; (Fem.) آغستل ِ āg̠ẖustali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.

\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0644.meaning: verb trans. (caus.) To cause to dress, attire, array, etc.; to dress out, to decorate. Pres. آغندوي āg̠ẖundawī; past واغستاوه wā-g̠ẖustāwuh, or واغستاوو wā-g̠ẖustāwo; fut. وا به غندوي wā bah g̠ẖundawī; imp. واغندوه wā-g̠ẖundawah; act. part. آغستوونکيَ āg̠ẖustawūnkaey, or آغستوونيَ āg̠ẖustawūnaey; past part. آغستوليَ āg̠ẖustawulaey; verb. n. اغستونه ag̠ẖustawunaʿh.
\u0622\u063a\u0633\u062a\u0648\u0644.original: آغستول āg̠ẖustawul, verb trans. (caus.) To cause to dress, attire, array, etc.; to dress out, to decorate. Pres. آغندوي āg̠ẖundawī; past واغستاوه wā-g̠ẖustāwuh, or واغستاوو wā-g̠ẖustāwo; fut. وا به غندوي wā bah g̠ẖundawī; imp. واغندوه wā-g̠ẖundawah; act. part. آغستوونکيَ āg̠ẖustawūnkaey, or آغستوونيَ āg̠ẖustawūnaey; past part. آغستوليَ āg̠ẖustawulaey; verb. n. اغستونه ag̠ẖustawunaʿh.

\u0627\u063a\u0644\u0628.meaning: adj. (compar. of غالب) Superior, stronger; adv. Most likely; (Fem.) اغلبه ag̠ẖlabaʿh.
original: adj. (compar. of غالب) Superior, stronger; adv. Most likely; (Fem.) اغلبه ag̠ẖlabaʿh.

\u0622\u063a\u0644\u0647.meaning: adj. Pleasing, handsome, good- looking, agreeable. 2. s.f. (3rd) (W.) Assisting by one's prayers (particularly a devotee). Pl. يْ ey. See ښاغل.
\u0622\u063a\u0644\u0647.original: آغله āg̠ẖalah, adj. Pleasing, handsome, good- looking, agreeable. 2. s.f. (3rd) (W.) Assisting by one's prayers (particularly a devotee). Pl. يْ ey. See ښاغل.

\u0622\u063a\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. Pleasing, agreeable, gratifying. 2. Good, excellent, prime; (Fem.) اغل ِ ag̠ẖali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.
\u0622\u063a\u0644\u064a.original: آغليَ āg̠ẖalaey, adj. Pleasing, agreeable, gratifying. 2. Good, excellent, prime; (Fem.) اغل ِ ag̠ẖali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.

\u0622\u063a\u0648\u0633\u062a\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To dress, to clothe, to array, to accoutre, etc. آغوستول āg̠ẖosta- wul, verb trans. (caus.) To cause to dress, to deck out, etc. See آغستل and آغستول.
\u0622\u063a\u0648\u0633\u062a\u0644.original: آغوستل āg̠ẖostal, verb trans. To dress, to clothe, to array, to accoutre, etc. آغوستول āg̠ẖosta- wul, verb trans. (caus.) To cause to dress, to deck out, etc. See آغستل and آغستول.

\u0622\u063a\u0648\u0633\u062a\u0646\u06.meaning: or آغستن āg̠ẖustan, s.f. (3rd) (verb. n.), Pl. يْ ey; s.m. (9th) Dress, clothing, raiment, apparel, costume, habiliment, uniform, etc. Sing. and Pl.
\u0622\u063a\u0648\u0633\u062a\u0646\u06.original: آغوستنه āg̠ẖostanaʿh, or آغستن āg̠ẖustan, s.f. (3rd) (verb. n.), Pl. يْ ey; s.m. (9th) Dress, clothing, raiment, apparel, costume, habiliment, uniform, etc. Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u063a\u0648\u0634.meaning: s.m. (2nd) The embrace, the side, the space between the bosom and the arms. 2. An armful. Pl. آغوشونه āg̠ẖos̱ẖūnah; آغوش کول āg̠ẖos̱ẖ kawul, or په آغوش کښي نیول pah āg̠ẖos̱ẖ kʿḵ́ẖey, or kś̱ẖey nīwal, verb trans. To take in the arms, to embrace.
original: s.m. (2nd) The embrace, the side, the space between the bosom and the arms. 2. An armful. Pl. آغوشونه āg̠ẖos̱ẖūnah; آغوش کول āg̠ẖos̱ẖ kawul, or په آغوش کښي نیول pah āg̠ẖos̱ẖ kʿḵ́ẖey, or kś̱ẖey nīwal, verb trans. To take in the arms, to embrace.

\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0627\u0631.meaning: s.m. (5th) (Pl. of غیر) Stranger, foreigner, a rival, an unknown person. Pl. اغیاران ag̠ẖ-yārān. اغیاره ag̠ẖ-yārʿah, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.m. (5th) (Pl. of غیر) Stranger, foreigner, a rival, an unknown person. Pl. اغیاران ag̠ẖ-yārān. اغیاره ag̠ẖ-yārʿah, s.f. (3rd). Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Indigestion, flatulence, dyspepsia. Pl. اغیړونه a-g̠ẖeṟṟūnah.
\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693.original: اغیړ a-g̠ẖeṟṟ, s.m. (2nd) Indigestion, flatulence, dyspepsia. Pl. اغیړونه a-g̠ẖeṟṟūnah.

\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u0644.meaning: verb trans. To trouble or afflict with indigestion or dyspepsia. Pres. اغیړي ag̠ẖeṟṟī; past ؤ اغیړه wu-ag̠ẖeṟṟah; fut. ؤ به اغیړي wu bah ag̠ẖeṟṟī; imp. ؤ اغیړه wu-ag̠ẖeṟṟah; act. part. اغیړنکيَ ag̠ẖeṟṟūnkaey, or اغیړونيَ ag̠ẖeṟṟūnaey; past part. اغیړلي ag̠ẖeṟṟalaey; verb. n. اغیړنه ag̠ẖeṟṟanaʿh.
\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u0644.original: اغیړل a-g̠ẖeṟṟal, verb trans. To trouble or afflict with indigestion or dyspepsia. Pres. اغیړي ag̠ẖeṟṟī; past ؤ اغیړه wu-ag̠ẖeṟṟah; fut. ؤ به اغیړي wu bah ag̠ẖeṟṟī; imp. ؤ اغیړه wu-ag̠ẖeṟṟah; act. part. اغیړنکيَ ag̠ẖeṟṟūnkaey, or اغیړونيَ ag̠ẖeṟṟūnaey; past part. اغیړلي ag̠ẖeṟṟalaey; verb. n. اغیړنه ag̠ẖeṟṟanaʿh.

\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u0644\u064a.meaning: adj. Troubled with dyspepsia, dyspeptic; (Fem.) اغیړل ِ ag̠ẖeṟṟali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.
\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u0644\u064a.original: اغیړليَ ag̠ẖeṟṟalaey, adj. Troubled with dyspepsia, dyspeptic; (Fem.) اغیړل ِ ag̠ẖeṟṟali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.

\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u064a.meaning: adj. Dyspeptic; (Fem.) اغیړِ ag̠ẖeṟṟi. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ي ī. See preceding.
\u0627\u063a\u06cc\u0693\u064a.original: اغیړي ag̠ẖeṟṟaey, adj. Dyspeptic; (Fem.) اغیړِ ag̠ẖeṟṟi. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) ي ī. See preceding.

\u0622\u0641\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Calamity, misfortune, wretchedness. Pl. آفتونه āfatūnah. آفت وهليَ āfat wahalaey, Unfortunate, overtaken with calamity, wretched; (Fem.) آفت وهل ِ āfat wahali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.
original: s.m. (2nd) Calamity, misfortune, wretchedness. Pl. آفتونه āfatūnah. آفت وهليَ āfat wahalaey, Unfortunate, overtaken with calamity, wretched; (Fem.) آفت وهل ِ āfat wahali. Pl. (Masc. and Fem.) يِ ī.

\u0622\u0641\u062a\u0627\u0628.meaning: s.m. (9th) The sun, sunshine. Sing. and Pl. آفتاب پرست āf-tāb parast, A worshipper of the sun; (Fem.) آفتاب پرسته āf-tāb parastaʿh.
original: s.m. (9th) The sun, sunshine. Sing. and Pl. آفتاب پرست āf-tāb parast, A worshipper of the sun; (Fem.) آفتاب پرسته āf-tāb parastaʿh.

\u0622\u0641\u062a\u0627\u0628\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) An ewer, a kind of pitcher. Pl. يْ ey. See ګړوه.
original: s.f. (3rd) An ewer, a kind of pitcher. Pl. يْ ey. See ګړوه.

\u0622\u0641\u062a\u0627\u0628\u064a.meaning: adj. Solar, of the sun. 2. Faded, yellow.
original: adj. Solar, of the sun. 2. Faded, yellow.

\u0627\u0641\u0631\u0648\u0632.meaning: act. part. of افروختن, Illuminating, enlightening, kindling. Used only in composition; as, جهان افروز jahān-afroz, Enlightening the world.
original: act. part. of افروختن, Illuminating, enlightening, kindling. Used only in composition; as, جهان افروز jahān-afroz, Enlightening the world.

\u0627\u0641\u0631\u0627.meaning: s.m. (9th) The name of a demon. Sing. and Pl.
\u0627\u0641\u0631\u0627.original: افرا af-rā, s.m. (9th) The name of a demon. Sing. and Pl.

\u0627\u0641\u0631\u0627\u0637.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of فرط) Excess, superfluity, abundance. Pl. افراطونه if-rāt̤ūnah.
original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of فرط) Excess, superfluity, abundance. Pl. افراطونه if-rāt̤ūnah.

\u0622\u0641\u0631\u06cc\u062f\u06ab\u06.meaning: s.m. (9th) The creator, Sing. and Pl.
original: s.m. (9th) The creator, Sing. and Pl.

\u0622\u0641\u0631\u06cc\u062f\u064a.meaning: s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns, notorious robbers, the bug-bear of the Peś̱ẖāwerīs. آفریديَ af-rīdaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. آفریدئِي āf-rīdaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl. See آپریدي.
\u0622\u0641\u0631\u06cc\u062f\u064a.original: آفریدي āf-rīdī, s.m. (1st) Pl. The name of a tribe of Afg̠ẖāns, notorious robbers, the bug-bear of the Peś̱ẖāwerīs. آفریديَ af-rīdaey, Sing. A male of the tribe. آفریدئِي āf-rīdaʿī, s.f. (6th) A female of the above. Sing. and Pl. See آپریدي.

\u0622\u0641\u0631\u06cc\u0646.meaning: or āfa-rīn, s.m. (2nd) Praise, applause, acclamation. Pl. آفرینونه āf-rīnūnah or āfarīnūnah. 2. interj. Bravo! well done! آفرین ویل af-rīn wa-yal, To praise, to applaud.
original: or āfa-rīn, s.m. (2nd) Praise, applause, acclamation. Pl. آفرینونه āf-rīnūnah or āfarīnūnah. 2. interj. Bravo! well done! آفرین ویل af-rīn wa-yal, To praise, to applaud.

\u0622\u0641\u0633\u0627\u0646\u0647.meaning: s.f. (3rd) A tale, story, romance, fiction. Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.f. (3rd) A tale, story, romance, fiction. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0641\u0633\u0631.meaning: s.m. (5th) A crown, a diadem. Pl. افسران af-sarān.

\u0627\u0641\u0633\u0631\u062f\u0647.meaning: adj. Frozen, withered, faded; dispirited, dejected, melancholy, low-spirited. افسرده دل af-surdah-dil, adj. Faint-hearted, low-spirited, dejected.
original: adj. Frozen, withered, faded; dispirited, dejected, melancholy, low-spirited. افسرده دل af-surdah-dil, adj. Faint-hearted, low-spirited, dejected.

\u0627\u0641\u0633\u0648\u0646.meaning: s.m. (2nd) Incantation, a spell, enchantment, sorcery, fascination. Pl. افسونونه af-sūnūnah. افسون کول af-sūn kawul, To enchant, to fascinate, to cast a spell over one. افسون ګر af-sūngar, s.m. (5th) An enchanter, a sorcerer. Pl. ګران garān. افسون ګره afsūn-garaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A sorceress, an enchantress. Pl. يْ ey.
original: s.m. (2nd) Incantation, a spell, enchantment, sorcery, fascination. Pl. افسونونه af-sūnūnah. افسون کول af-sūn kawul, To enchant, to fascinate, to cast a spell over one. افسون ګر af-sūngar, s.m. (5th) An enchanter, a sorcerer. Pl. ګران garān. افسون ګره afsūn-garaʿh, s.f. (3rd) A sorceress, an enchantress. Pl. يْ ey.

\u0627\u0641\u0634\u0627\u0646.meaning: pres. part. of افشاندن (used in comp.) Scattering, shedding, dispersing; as, ګل افشان gul-afs̱ẖān, Strewing roses; زر افشان zar-afs̱ẖān, Scattering gold.
original: pres. part. of افشاندن (used in comp.) Scattering, shedding, dispersing; as, ګل افشان gul-afs̱ẖān, Strewing roses; زر افشان zar-afs̱ẖān, Scattering gold.

\u0627\u0641\u0636\u0644.meaning: adj. (compar. of فاضل) More or most eminent, pre-eminent. 2. A proper name; (Fem.) افضله afẓalaʿh.
original: adj. (compar. of فاضل) More or most eminent, pre-eminent. 2. A proper name; (Fem.) افضله afẓalaʿh.

\u0627\u0641\u063a\u0627\u0646.meaning: s.m. (5th) The name of a powerful nation inhabiting Afg̠ẖānistān, supposed to be the descendants of the Lost Tribes. 2. An Afg̠ẖān. 3. The name of the grandson of Malik Tālūt (Saul), king of Israel, from whom the Afg̠ẖāns, called also Afg̠ẖānah, claim descent. According to the Taẓkirat-ul-Mulūk, "the original meaning of the word Afg̠ẖānah is fig̠ẖān, a Persian word, which means complaint or lamentation, because Malik Afg̠ẖān, the ancestor of the Afg̠ẖāns, was a cause of lamentation to the devil, the jinns, and mankind. From the constant use of the word, the vowel-point (ــِــ) kasrah was dropped, after which the other letters could not be sounded without the aid of a vowel, and alif-i-waṣl was placed before the g̠ẖ, and thus made afg̠ẖānah." See "Remarks on the Afg̠ẖān people and language:" Journal of Bengal Asiatic Society, vol. xxiii, page 560, and the Introduction to my Puś̱ẖto Grammar. Pl. افغانان afg̠ẖānān. افغانه afg̠ẖānaʿh, s.f. (3rd) An Afg̠ẖān female. Pl. يْ ey. افغاني afg̠ẖānī, s.f. (3rd) The language of the Afg̠ẖāns, the Puś̱ẖto (W.), or Puḵ́ẖto (E.). Pl. ئِي aʿī. 2. adj. Of the Afg̠ẖāns, relating to the Afg̠ẖāns.
\u0627\u0641\u063a\u0627\u0646.original: افغان af-g̠ẖān, s.m. (5th) The name of a powerful nation inhabiting Afg̠ẖānistān, supposed to be the descendants of the Lost Tribes. 2. An Afg̠ẖān. 3. The name of the grandson of Malik Tālūt (Saul), king of Israel, from whom the Afg̠ẖāns, called also Afg̠ẖānah, claim descent. According to the Taẓkirat-ul-Mulūk, "the original meaning of the word Afg̠ẖānah is fig̠ẖān, a Persian word, which means complaint or lamentation, because Malik Afg̠ẖān, the ancestor of the Afg̠ẖāns, was a cause of lamentation to the devil, the jinns, and mankind. From the constant use of the word, the vowel-point (ــِــ) kasrah was dropped, after which the other letters could not be sounded without the aid of a vowel, and alif-i-waṣl was placed before the g̠ẖ, and thus made afg̠ẖānah." See "Remarks on the Afg̠ẖān people and language:" Journal of Bengal Asiatic Society, vol. xxiii, page 560, and the Introduction to my Puś̱ẖto Grammar. Pl. افغانان afg̠ẖānān. افغانه afg̠ẖānaʿh, s.f. (3rd) An Afg̠ẖān female. Pl. يْ ey. افغاني afg̠ẖānī, s.f. (3rd) The language of the Afg̠ẖāns, the Puś̱ẖto (W.), or Puḵ́ẖto (E.). Pl. ئِي aʿī. 2. adj. Of the Afg̠ẖāns, relating to the Afg̠ẖāns.

\u0627\u0641\u06ab\u0627\u0631.meaning: adj. Wounded; (Fem.) افګاره af-gāraʿh. دل افګار dil-afgār, Heart-broken.
original: adj. Wounded; (Fem.) افګاره af-gāraʿh. دل افګار dil-afgār, Heart-broken.

original: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of فلس) Penury, poverty, indigence, bankruptcy. Pl. افلاسونه if-lāsūnah.

\u0627\u0642\u0627\u0645\u062a.meaning: s.m. (2nd) (inf. IV of قياه) Resting, staying, abode, residence, dwelling. 2. Being earnest in prayer or supplication, rising up and sitting down in prayer.
